CVE-2012-0002.title: Windows Remote Desktop Protocol Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0002.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Remote Desktop. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The system does not properly access an object in memory that has been improperly initialized or has been deleted [CVE-2012-0002]. A remote user can send a series of specially crafted RDP protocol data to execute arbitrary code on the target system.If Network Level Authentication is enabled, the remote user must first authenticate to Remote Desktop Services.Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted RDP protocol data to cause the RDP service to stop responding [CVE-2012-0152].
CVE-2012-0002.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause the RDP service to stop responding.

CVE-2012-0005.title: Windows Client-Server Run-time Subsystem Unicode Processing Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0005.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Client-Server Run-time Subsystem. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The software does not properly processes a sequence of specially crafted Unicode characters. A local user can run specially crafted code to access memory that has not been properly initialized and execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.Systems that run with a multi-byte language system locale (e.g., Chinese, Japanese, or Korean) are affected.Kang Wu of Shenzhen Jowto Research Dep reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0005.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0006.title: Microsoft DNS Server Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0006.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft DNS Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted DNS query to cause the target system to stop responding and automatically restart.The vulnerability resides in the management of objects in memory while the system is looking up a resource record.
CVE-2012-0006.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding and automatically restart.

CVE-2012-0007.title: Microsoft Anti-Cross Site Scripting Library Flaw May Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-0007.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Anti-Cross Site Scripting Library. A remote user may be able to conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The library does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input. A remote user may be able to exploit a target application that uses the library to cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the application using the Microsoft Anti-Cross Site Scripting Library software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The specific impact depends on how the target application uses the library.Adi Cohen of IBM Rational Application Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0007.extra: A remote user may be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the application using the Microsoft Anti-Cross Site Scripting Library, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2012-0018.title: Microsoft Visio Viewer Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0018.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Visio Viewer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Visio (VSD) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Luigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability via Verisign's iDefense Labs.
CVE-2012-0018.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0023.title: VLC Media Player TIVO Demuxer Double Free May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0023.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TY file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a double free memory error in get_chunk_header() and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'modules/demux/ty.c'.Clement Lecigne reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0023.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, may execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0036.title: Oracle Hyperion Bugs Let Remote Users Partially Access and Modify Data and Partially Deny Service
CVE-2012-0036.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Hyperion. A remote user can partially access data on the target system. A remote user can partially modify data on the target system. A remote user can cause partially denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Hyperion Essbase component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2012-0036].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Hyperion Common Security component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4773].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Hyperion Enterprise Performance Management Architect component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-2584].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Hyperion Enterprise Performance Management Architect component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-2592].The following researchers reported these and other Oracle product vulnerabilities:Adam Willard of Foreground Security; an Anonymous researcher via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure Program; Aniway.Anyway via HP's Zero Day Initiative; Arezou Hosseinzad-Amirkhizi of TELUS Security Labs; Benjamin Kunz Mejri of Evolution Security; Borked of the Google Security Team; CERT/CC; Christiaan Esterhuizen of Trustwave; Christian Schneider; Danny Tsechansky; David Jorm; David Litchfield of Google; Derek Abdine of rapid7.com; Florian Lukavsky of SEC Consult Vulnerability Lab; Florian Weimer of Red Hat; Hanno Bock; Jacob Smith; Juraj Somorovsky of Ruhr-University Bochum; Jorg Schwenk of Ruhr-University Bochum; Karthikeyan Bhargavan; Kyle Lovett; Martin Rakhmanov of Trustwave; Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero; Microsoft Vulnerability Research of Microsoft Corp; Owais Mohammad Khan formerly of KPMG; Recx Ltd.; Richard Birkett of Worldpay; Richard Harrison of E.ON Business Services GmbH; Roberto Suggi Liverani of NATO Communications and Information Agency; Sandeep Kamble of SecureLayer7; Steven Seeley of HP's Zero Day Initiative; Tibor Jager of Ruhr-University Bochum; Tudor Enache of Help AG; and Vladimir Wolstencroft.
CVE-2012-0036.extra: A remote user can partially obtain data on the target system.A remote user can partially modify data on the target system.A remote user can cause partially denial of service conditions.

CVE-2012-0037.title: OpenOffice.org XML External Entity Processing Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2012-0037.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create a specially crafted external entity that refers to file system resources on the target user's system. When the target user loads the ODF document, information from the target user's system may be silently injected into the ODF document.If the document is later distributed to other users, the information may be disclosed.Timothy D. Morgan of Virtual Security Research, LLC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0037.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-0043.title: Wireshark Buffer Overflow in RLC Dissector Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0043.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted RLC data to trigger a buffer overflow in the RLC dissector and cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2012-0043.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to crash.

CVE-2012-0047.title: Apache Wicket Input Validation Flaw in 'wicket:pageMapName' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-0047.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Wicket. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'wicket:pageMapName' request parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Apache Wicket software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Apache Wicket 1.3.x and 1.5.x are not affected.Jens Schenck reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0047.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Apache Wicket software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-0050.title: OpenSSL DTLS Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0050.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The fix to correct the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) vulnerability referenced by CVE-2011-4108 [Alert ID 1026485] introduced a flaw. A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause denial of service conditions on the target system.Only DTLS applications using OpenSSL 1.0.0f and 0.9.8s are affected.Antonio Martin, Enterprise Secure Access Research and Development, Cisco Systems, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0050.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2012-0060.title: RPM Package Manager Header Processing and Signature Validation Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0060.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RPM Package Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted RPM file that, when accessed by the target user, will trigger a flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The flaw may occur when the package header is accessed or when the package signature is verified. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The headerVerifyInfo() function is affected [CVE-2012-0815].The processing of region tags in the headerLoad(), rpmReadSignature(), and headerVerify() functions is affected [CVE-2012-0060].The processing of region size in the headerLoad() function is affected [CVE-2012-0061].
CVE-2012-0060.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when accessed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0061.title: RPM Package Manager Header Processing and Signature Validation Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0061.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RPM Package Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted RPM file that, when accessed by the target user, will trigger a flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The flaw may occur when the package header is accessed or when the package signature is verified. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The headerVerifyInfo() function is affected [CVE-2012-0815].The processing of region tags in the headerLoad(), rpmReadSignature(), and headerVerify() functions is affected [CVE-2012-0060].The processing of region size in the headerLoad() function is affected [CVE-2012-0061].
CVE-2012-0061.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when accessed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0064.title: X Debugging Feature Lets Physically Local Users Bypass Screen Locking Applications
CVE-2012-0064.body: A vulnerability was reported in X. A physically local user can bypass screen locking applications.XKB actions for debugging X.org clients are enabled by default. A physically local user can press certain keyboard key combinations to bypass screensaver lock programs and access the system.Gu1 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0064.extra: A physically local user can bypass screen locking applications.

CVE-2012-0128.title: HP Onboard Administrator Bugs Let Remote Users Gain Access, Obtain Information, and Conduct URL Redirection Attacks
CVE-2012-0128.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Onboard Administrator. A remote user can gain access. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks [CVE-2012-0128].A remote user can gain unauthorized access [CVE-2012-0129].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0130].
CVE-2012-0128.extra: A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can gain unauthorized access.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-0129.title: HP Onboard Administrator Bugs Let Remote Users Gain Access, Obtain Information, and Conduct URL Redirection Attacks
CVE-2012-0129.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Onboard Administrator. A remote user can gain access. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks [CVE-2012-0128].A remote user can gain unauthorized access [CVE-2012-0129].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0130].
CVE-2012-0129.extra: A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can gain unauthorized access.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-0130.title: HP Onboard Administrator Bugs Let Remote Users Gain Access, Obtain Information, and Conduct URL Redirection Attacks
CVE-2012-0130.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Onboard Administrator. A remote user can gain access. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks [CVE-2012-0128].A remote user can gain unauthorized access [CVE-2012-0129].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0130].
CVE-2012-0130.extra: A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can gain unauthorized access.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-0141.title: Microsoft Office Excel File Memory Corruption Errors and Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0141.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Office, will trigger a memory corruption error or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Excel Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack SP2/SP3 are also affected.Omair (via iDefense), Sean Larsson and Jun Mao (via iDefense), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0141.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0142.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Office, will trigger a memory corruption error or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Excel Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack SP2/SP3 are also affected.Omair (via iDefense), Sean Larsson and Jun Mao (via iDefense), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0142.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0146.title: Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Conduct Browser Redirection Attacks
CVE-2012-0146.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can conduct browser redirection attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will redirect the target authenticated user's browser to an arbitrary system that appears to be the Forefront Unified Access Gateway system [CVE-2012-0146].A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTPS query to the target server to access restricted resources on the target system [CVE-2012-0147].
CVE-2012-0146.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can conduct browser redirection attacks.

CVE-2012-0151.title: Windows Authenticode Signature Verification Can Be Bypassed By Remote or Local Users
CVE-2012-0151.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Authenticode Signature Verification. A remote user can bypass signature verification.A remote user can modify a valid and signed PE file that, when verified by the target user, will bypass the WinVerifyTrust signature verification and execute arbitrary code.Robert Zacek and Igor Glucksmann of Avast Software reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0151.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Windows Authenticode Signature Verification.

CVE-2012-0152.title: Windows Remote Desktop Protocol Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0152.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Windows Remote Desktop. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The system does not properly access an object in memory that has been improperly initialized or has been deleted [CVE-2012-0002]. A remote user can send a series of specially crafted RDP protocol data to execute arbitrary code on the target system.If Network Level Authentication is enabled, the remote user must first authenticate to Remote Desktop Services.Luigi Auriemma (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted RDP protocol data to cause the RDP service to stop responding [CVE-2012-0152].
CVE-2012-0152.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause the RDP service to stop responding.

CVE-2012-0158.title: Microsoft Commerce Server Windows Common Controls (MSCOMCTL.OCX) Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0158.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Commerce Server. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the MSCOMCTL.OCX ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSIDs of the vulnerable controls are:BDD1F04B-858B-11D1-B16A-00C0F0283628996BF5E0-8044-4650-ADEB-0B013914E99CC74190B6-8589-11D1-B16A-00C0F02836289181DC5F-E07D-418A-ACA6-8EEA1ECB8E9EOther Microsoft products contain the vulnerable Windows Common Controls.
CVE-2012-0158.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0159.title: Windows OS Lets Remote Users Cause Arbitrary Code to Be Executed and Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0159.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows operating system. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TrueType font that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-3402, CVE-2012-0159]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A local user can trigger a windows and messages handling flaw in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-0180].A local user can trigger a keyboard layout file processing error in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-0181].A local user can trigger a scrollbar calculation flaw in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-1848].Alin Rad Pop (via Tipping Point's Zero Day Initiative), Tarjei Mandt of Azimuth Security, Nicolas Economou of Core Security Technologies, Geoff McDonald of Symantec, and h4ckmp reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0159.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0160.title: Microsoft .NET Framework Serialization Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0160.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET Framework. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted web page that, when loaded by the target user via a web browser that can run XAML Browser Applications (XBAPs), will trigger a serialization error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0160.extra: A remote user can create a web page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0161.title: Microsoft .NET Framework Serialization Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0161.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET Framework. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted web page that, when loaded by the target user via a web browser that can run XAML Browser Applications (XBAPs), will trigger a serialization error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0161.extra: A remote user can create a web page that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0163.title: Microsoft .NET Parameter Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0163.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a web site that contains a specially crafted XAML browser application (XBAP) that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an input validation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Vitaliy Toropov (VeriSign iDefense Labs) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0163.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0165.title: Microsoft GDI+ Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0165.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft GDI+. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted EMF file that, when loaded by the target user (via a Microsoft Office file, for example), will trigger a memory corruptiion error [CVE-2012-0165] or heap overflow [CVE-2012-0167] and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office is affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via iDefense.
CVE-2012-0165.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0167.title: Microsoft GDI+ Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office is affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities via iDefense.
CVE-2012-0167.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0168.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0168.body: Several vulnerabilities reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Arbitrary code can be executed when the target user prints specially crafted HTML content with the "Print table of links" option enabled [CVE-2012-0168].A JScript9 memory corruption error may allow code execution [CVE-2012-0169].An OnReadyStateChange memory corruption error may allow code execution [CVE-2012-0170].A SelectAll memory corruption error may allow code execution [CVE-2012-0171].A VML Style memory corruption error may allow code execution [CVE-2012-0172].linx2008 of AISec, Roel Spilker of TOPdesk, Jose Antonio Vazquez Gonzalez (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0168.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0174.title: Windows TCP/IP Stack Lets Remote Users Bypass the Firewall and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0174.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows TCP/IP Stack. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user on the local network can bypass the firewall in certain cases.In certain cases, Windows Firewall does not properly filter outbound broadcast packets with an outbound firewall rule applied [CVE-2012-0174]. A remote user on the local network can bypass the firewall. Bojan Zdrnja of INFIGO IS reported this vulnerability.The TCP/IP stack does not properly handle the binding of an IPv6 address to a local interface [CVE-2012-0179]. A local user can exploit this to trigger a double free memory error and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2012-0174.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user on the local network can bypass the firewall in certain cases.

CVE-2012-0176.title: Microsoft Silverlight Double Free Memory Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0176.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Silverlight. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.Silverlight does not properly free memory while rendering specially crafted XAML glyphs. A remote user can create a specially crafted Silverlight application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Alex Plaskett of MWR InfoSecurity reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0176.extra: A remote user can create Silverlight content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0177.title: Microsoft Works WPS File Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0177.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Works. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Works (.wps) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the Works File Converter and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2012-0177.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0177.title: Microsoft Office WPS File Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0177.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Works (.wps) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the Works File Converter and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2012-0177.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0178.title: Microsoft Windows Partition Manager Memory Allocation Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0178.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Partition Manager. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can run specially crafted code to cause two or more processes or threads to call Plug and Play (PnP) Configuration Manager functions at the same time and trigger a memory allocation error.The Windows Partition Manager (partmgr.sys) is affected.
CVE-2012-0178.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0179.title: Windows TCP/IP Stack Lets Remote Users Bypass the Firewall and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0179.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows TCP/IP Stack. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user on the local network can bypass the firewall in certain cases.In certain cases, Windows Firewall does not properly filter outbound broadcast packets with an outbound firewall rule applied [CVE-2012-0174]. A remote user on the local network can bypass the firewall. Bojan Zdrnja of INFIGO IS reported this vulnerability.The TCP/IP stack does not properly handle the binding of an IPv6 address to a local interface [CVE-2012-0179]. A local user can exploit this to trigger a double free memory error and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2012-0179.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user on the local network can bypass the firewall in certain cases.

CVE-2012-0180.title: Windows OS Lets Remote Users Cause Arbitrary Code to Be Executed and Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0180.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows operating system. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TrueType font that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-3402, CVE-2012-0159]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A local user can trigger a windows and messages handling flaw in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-0180].A local user can trigger a keyboard layout file processing error in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-0181].A local user can trigger a scrollbar calculation flaw in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-1848].Alin Rad Pop (via Tipping Point's Zero Day Initiative), Tarjei Mandt of Azimuth Security, Nicolas Economou of Core Security Technologies, Geoff McDonald of Symantec, and h4ckmp reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0180.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0181.title: Windows OS Lets Remote Users Cause Arbitrary Code to Be Executed and Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges

A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TrueType font that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2011-3402, CVE-2012-0159]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A local user can trigger a windows and messages handling flaw in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-0180].A local user can trigger a keyboard layout file processing error in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-0181].A local user can trigger a scrollbar calculation flaw in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code in the context of another process [CVE-2012-1848].Alin Rad Pop (via Tipping Point's Zero Day Initiative), Tarjei Mandt of Azimuth Security, Nicolas Economou of Core Security Technologies, Geoff McDonald of Symantec, and h4ckmp reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0181.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0184.title: Microsoft Office Excel File Memory Corruption Errors and Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0184.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Office, will trigger a memory corruption error or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Excel Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack SP2/SP3 are also affected.Omair (via iDefense), Sean Larsson and Jun Mao (via iDefense), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0184.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0185.title: Microsoft Office Excel File Memory Corruption Errors and Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0185.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Office, will trigger a memory corruption error or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Excel Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack SP2/SP3 are also affected.Omair (via iDefense), Sean Larsson and Jun Mao (via iDefense), and an anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0185.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0219.title: socat Buffer Overflow in xioscan_readline() Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0219.body: A vulnerability was reported in socat. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply specially crafted READLINE command line data to trigger a heap overflow in xioscan_readline() and execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the socat process.Johan Thillemann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0219.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0225.title: Wonderware Information Server Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection, and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2012-0225.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wonderware Information Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-0225]. The code will originate from the site running the Wonderware Information Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2012-0226].A remote user can exploit security access permission flaws to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2012-0228].The original advisory is available at:http://www.us-cert.gov/control_systems/pdf/ICSA-12-062-01.pdfBilly Rios and Terry McCorkle reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0225.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Wonderware Information Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-0225.title: Wonderware Historian Client Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting, SQL Injection, and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2012-0225.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wonderware Historian Client. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-0225]. The code will originate from the site running the Wonderware Historian Client software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database and potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2012-0226].A remote user can exploit security access permission flaws to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2012-0228].Wonderware Historian Client versions installed on the same node as the Wonderware Information Server Portal or Client are affected.The original advisory is available at:http://www.us-cert.gov/control_systems/pdf/ICSA-12-062-01.pdfBilly Rios and Terry McCorkle reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2012-0247.title: ImageMagick Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2012-0247.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in ImageMagick. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.Specially crafted exchangeable image file format (Exif) metadata can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-0247].Specially crafted Exif metadata can cause ImageMagick to enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-0248].Specially crafted Exif tags can trigger an invalid memory access and cause ImageMagick to crash [CVE-2012-0259].Specially crafted JPEG images can cause ImageMagick to consume excessive memory and CPU resources [CVE-2012-0260].Specially crafted Exif IFD values in TIFF images can trigger an out-of-bounds buffer read and cause ImageMagick to crash [CVE-2012-1798].
CVE-2012-0247.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2012-0256.title: Apache Traffic Server Host Header Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0256.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Traffic Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a request with a specially crafted 'Host' header value to trigger a heap allocation error and cause the target service to crash.The Codenomicon CROSS project reported this vulnerability via CERT-FI.
CVE-2012-0256.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2012-0259.title: ImageMagick Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2012-0259.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in ImageMagick. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.Specially crafted exchangeable image file format (Exif) metadata can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-0247].Specially crafted Exif metadata can cause ImageMagick to enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-0248].Specially crafted Exif tags can trigger an invalid memory access and cause ImageMagick to crash [CVE-2012-0259].Specially crafted JPEG images can cause ImageMagick to consume excessive memory and CPU resources [CVE-2012-0260].Specially crafted Exif IFD values in TIFF images can trigger an out-of-bounds buffer read and cause ImageMagick to crash [CVE-2012-1798].
CVE-2012-0259.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2012-0265.title: Apple QuickTime Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0265.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Only Windows-based systems are affected.A file opened from a specially crafted path can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2012-0265].A specially crafted TeXML file can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2012-0663].A specially crafted text track in a movie file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2012-0664].A specially crafted H.264 encoded movie file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2012-0665].A specially rafted QTMovie object can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2012-0666].A specially crafted QTVR movie file can trigger a signedness error [CVE-2012-0667].A specially crafted RLE encoded movie file can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2012-0668].A specially crafted Sorenson encoded movie file can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2012-0669].A specially crafted QuickTime sean atom can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2012-0670].A specially crafted '.pict' file can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2012-0671].Tielei Wang of Georgia Tech Information Security Center (via Secunia SVCRP), Alexander Gavrun working (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Luigi Auriemma (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), CHkr_D591 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Alin Rad Pop (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Damian Put (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Tom Gallagher (Microsoft) and Paul Bates (Microsoft) HP's Zero Day Initiative, Rodrigo Rubira Branco from the Qualys Vulnerability & Malware Research Labs (VMRL) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0265.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0272.title: Novell GroupWise WebAccess Input Validation Flaw in 'merge' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-0272.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise WebAccess. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'merge' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the GroupWise WebAccess software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Novell has assigned Novell Bug IDs 702785 and 740563 to this vulnerability.Joshua Tiago, Cirosec, reported this vulnerability via Secunia.
CVE-2012-0272.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the GroupWise software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-0275.title: Adobe Photoshop Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0275.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Photoshop. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-4170]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Francis Provencher (via Secunia SVCRP) reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted SGI24LogLum-compressed TIFF image that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-0275]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0275.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0284.title: Cisco WVC200 Wireless Internet Video Camera Buffer Overflow in PlayerPT ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0284.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco WVC200 Wireless Internet Video Camera. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the SetSource() function of the PlayerPT ActiveX control ('PlayerPT.ocx') and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerable control is included with the Cisco WVC200 Wireless-G PTZ Internet Video Camera.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 9E065E4A-BD9D-4547-8F90-985DC62A5591rgod reported one vulnerability. Carsten Eiram, Secunia Research, reported the other vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0284.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0287.title: WordPress Input Validation Flaw in 'wp-comments-post.php' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-0287.body: A vulnerability was reported in WordPress. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'wp-comments-post.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the WordPress software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://oldmanlab.blogspot.com/2012/01/wordpress-33-xss-vulnerability.htmlAditya Modha and Samir Shah reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0287.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WordPress software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-0289.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Bugs Let Remote Users Delete Files and Execute Arbitrary Code and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0289.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection. A remote user can delete files on the target system. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in a service on the target Manager console to traverse the directory and delete files on the target system [CVE-2012-0294]. Version 12.1 is affected.A remote user can then insert and execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2012-0295]. Version 12.1 is affected.Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's ZeroDay Initiative.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in a function on Symantec Network Access Control and Symantec Endpoint Protection to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2012-0289].Anil Aphale, aka 41.w4r10r, with ControlCase India Pvt Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0289.extra: A remote user can delete files on the target system and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0294.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Bugs Let Remote Users Delete Files and Execute Arbitrary Code and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges

A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in a service on the target Manager console to traverse the directory and delete files on the target system [CVE-2012-0294]. Version 12.1 is affected.A remote user can then insert and execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2012-0295]. Version 12.1 is affected.Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's ZeroDay Initiative.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in a function on Symantec Network Access Control and Symantec Endpoint Protection to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2012-0289].Anil Aphale, aka 41.w4r10r, with ControlCase India Pvt Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0294.extra: A remote user can delete files on the target system and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0295.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Bugs Let Remote Users Delete Files and Execute Arbitrary Code and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0295.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection. A remote user can delete files on the target system. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. Version 12.1 is affected.A remote user can then insert and execute arbitrary code with System privileges [CVE-2012-0295]. Version 12.1 is affected.Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint's ZeroDay Initiative.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in a function on Symantec Network Access Control and Symantec Endpoint Protection to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2012-0289].Anil Aphale, aka 41.w4r10r, with ControlCase India Pvt Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0295.extra: A remote user can delete files on the target system and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0304.title: Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0304.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The default installation of Symantec LiveUpdate Administrator installs files with full control privileges granted to the 'Everyone' group.A local user can exploit this flaw to read arbitrary files with System privileges and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system with System privileges.Tenable Network Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0304.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0306.title: Symantec Ghost Solution Suite Backup File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0306.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Ghost Solution Suite. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted backup file that, when loaded by the target user via Symantec Ghost Solution Suite, will trigger a memory corruption merror and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Jeremy Brown at Microsoft (via the Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) team) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0306.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0317.title: Movable Type Flaws Permit Remote Authenticated Command Injection and Remote Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2012-0317.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Movable Type. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote authenticated user with upload permissions and permission to sign-in to the admin script can exploit a flaw in the file management system to execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system.The commenting and the community scripts do not properly filter validate user-supplied input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target authenticated user's browser. The code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Movable Type software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Certain templates are affected.The 'mt-wizard.cgi' script is also affected [CVE-2012-1262]. Trustwave reported the 'mt-wizard.cgi' vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0317.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Movable Type software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-0329.title: Cisco Digital Media Manager Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-0329.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Digital Media Manager. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.The system does not properly validate unreferenced URLs. A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted URL via TCP port 8443 to access administrative resources and gain administrative privileges.Cisco Show and Share is not directly affected by this vulnerability, but a user can exploit the Cisco Digital Media Manager to gain full access to Cisco Show and Share.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCts63878 to this vulnerability.Anthony Towry reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0329.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-0333.title: Cisco IP Small Business Phones XML Authentication Flaw Lets Remote Users Make Unauthorized
CVE-2012-0333.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Small Business IP Phones. A remote user can make unauthorized phone calls.A remote user can submit a Push XML request to make telephone calls via an XML document without authenticating.Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts08768 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0333.extra: A remote user can make unauthorized phone calls.

CVE-2012-0335.title: Cisco ASA Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct HTTP Response Splitting and Denial of Service Attacks and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2012-0335.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct HTTP response splitting attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can exploit a CRLF injection flaw in '/+CSCOE+/logon.html' to cause the target server to return a split response [CVE-2011-3285]. A remote user can exploit this to spoof content on the target server, attempt to poison any intermediate web caches, or conduct cross-site scripting attacks. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCth63101 to this vulnerability. ASA 5500 series devices with software 8.0 through 8.4 are affected.A remote user can read IKE responder traffic to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2011-3309]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtt07749 to this vulnerability. ASA 5500 series devices with software 8.2 through 8.4 are affected.A remote user can exploit a flaw in cut-through proxy authentication processing to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-0335]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtx42746 to this vulnerability. Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) 5500 series devices with software 7.2 through 8.4 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the ESMTP inspection feature and cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system [CVE-2011-4006]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtt32565 to this vulnerability. ASA 5500 series devices with software 8.2 through 8.5 are affected.
CVE-2012-0335.extra: A remote user can cause excessive CPU consumption on the target device.A remote user can cause arbitrary content to be displayed.A remote user may be able to poison any intermediate web caches with arbitrary content.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-0338.title: Cisco IOS Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Security Controls, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Deny Service
CVE-2012-0338.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security controls. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets on a NAT interface to consume excessive CPU resources [CVE-2011-2578]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts12366 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.1 and 15.2 are affected.A remote user can return a specially crafted HTTP response to trigger a flaw in the HTTP client and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-2586]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts12249 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.A physically local user can bypass the No Service Password-Recovery feature and read the start-up configuration [CVE-2011-3289]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtr97640 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.4 and 15.0 through 15.2 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to trigger a flaw in the NETIO and IPV4_IO processes and cause excessive CPU consumption on the target device [CVE-2011-3295]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCti59888 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS XR 3.8 through 4.1 is affected.A remote user can send specially crafted traffic to trigger a flaw in the "set mpls experimental imposition" command and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-4007]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtr56576 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.0 and 15.1 and IOS XE 3.x are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an ICMPv6 ACL bug with unspecified impact [CVE-2011-4012]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID Bug ID CSCtj90091 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.0, 15.0, and 15.1 are affected. Systems using a Policy Feature Card 3C (PFC3C) are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted UDP traffic to UDP port 465 to cause an interface queue wedge [CVE-2011-4015]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts48300 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.2S is affected.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to trigger a flaw in the PPP implementation and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-4016]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtf71673 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 and 15.0 through 15.2 are affected. Systems using Point-to-Point Termination and Aggregation (PTA) and L2TP are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0338]. A remote user can establish a SSH connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv86113 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0339]. A remote user can establish a Telnet connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi77774 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The ACL function does not properly process lines that end with a log or time keyword [CVE-2012-0362]. A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to bypass access control list (ACL) restrictions in certain cases. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts01106 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2(58)SE2 and 15.0(1)SE are affected.
CVE-2012-0338.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can connect via Telnet and SSH from arbitrary IP addresses.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.

CVE-2012-0353.title: Cisco ASA Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0353.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data via UDP through the device to trigger a flaw in the UDP inspection engine and cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-0353]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtq10441 to this vulnerability.The following UDP-based protocols may be affected: * Domain Name System (DNS) * Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) * Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) * GPRS Tunneling Protocol (GTP) * H.323, H.225 RAS * Media Gateway Control Protocol (MGCP) * SunRPC * Trivial File Transfer Protocol (TFTP) * X Display Manager Control Protocol (XDMCP) * IBM NetBios * Instant Messaging (depending on the particular IM client/solution being used)When the target device is configured with the Cisco ASA Scanning Threat Mode feature and with the shun option enabled, a remote user can cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-0354]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtw35765 to this vulnerability.If a remote user can create a condition that will cause syslog message ID 305006 to be generated, the remote user can cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-0355]. Syslog message ID 305006 is generated when the device is unable to create a network address translation for a new connection. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCts39634 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) message to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-0356]. Devices with multicast routing enabled are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtr47517 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series ASA Services Module (ASASM) is also affected by these vulnerabilities.The vendor reports that Cisco PIX Security Appliances may be affected by some of the vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0353.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtw35765 to this vulnerability.If a remote user can create a condition that will cause syslog message ID 305006 to be generated, the remote user can cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-0355]. Syslog message ID 305006 is generated when the device is unable to create a network address translation for a new connection. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCts39634 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) message to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-0356]. Devices with multicast routing enabled are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtr47517 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series ASA Services Module (ASASM) is also affected by these vulnerabilities.The vendor reports that Cisco PIX Security Appliances may be affected by some of the vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0356.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-0356.title: Cisco Firewall Services Module Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0356.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Firewall Services Module. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) message to cause the target device to reload. Devices with multicast routing enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtu97367 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0356.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-0358.title: Cisco ASA Clientless VPN ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-0358.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the Clientless VPN ActiveX control (cscopf.ocx) and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is:B8E73359-3422-4384-8D27-4EA1B4C01232Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtr00165 to this vulnerability.Will Dormann of the CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-0358.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-0361.title: Cisco IP Communicator SCCP Message Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-0361.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IP Communicator. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can cause the software to send multiple on-hook and off-hook SCCP messages to the Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM).Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCti40315 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: The vendor advisory does not indicate if the target of the denial of service is the CIC or the CUCM.]
CVE-2012-0361.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2012-0362.title: Cisco IOS Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Security Controls, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Deny Service
CVE-2012-0362.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security controls. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets on a NAT interface to consume excessive CPU resources [CVE-2011-2578]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts12366 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.1 and 15.2 are affected.A remote user can return a specially crafted HTTP response to trigger a flaw in the HTTP client and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-2586]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts12249 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.A physically local user can bypass the No Service Password-Recovery feature and read the start-up configuration [CVE-2011-3289]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtr97640 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.4 and 15.0 through 15.2 are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to trigger a flaw in the NETIO and IPV4_IO processes and cause excessive CPU consumption on the target device [CVE-2011-3295]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCti59888 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS XR 3.8 through 4.1 is affected.A remote user can send specially crafted traffic to trigger a flaw in the "set mpls experimental imposition" command and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-4007]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtr56576 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.0 and 15.1 and IOS XE 3.x are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an ICMPv6 ACL bug with unspecified impact [CVE-2011-4012]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID Bug ID CSCtj90091 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.0, 15.0, and 15.1 are affected. Systems using a Policy Feature Card 3C (PFC3C) are affected.A remote user can send specially crafted UDP traffic to UDP port 465 to cause an interface queue wedge [CVE-2011-4015]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts48300 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 15.2S is affected.A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to trigger a flaw in the PPP implementation and cause the target device to crash [CVE-2011-4016]. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCtf71673 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 and 15.0 through 15.2 are affected. Systems using Point-to-Point Termination and Aggregation (PTA) and L2TP are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0338]. A remote user can establish a SSH connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv86113 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The device does not properly process the vrf-also keyword during enforcement of access-class commands [CVE-2012-0339]. A remote user can establish a Telnet connection from arbitrary IP addresses. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi77774 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2 through 12.4 and 15.0 are affected.The ACL function does not properly process lines that end with a log or time keyword [CVE-2012-0362]. A remote user can send specially crafted network traffic to bypass access control list (ACL) restrictions in certain cases. Cisco has assigned Bug ID CSCts01106 to this vulnerability. Cisco IOS 12.2(58)SE2 and 15.0(1)SE are affected.
CVE-2012-0362.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can connect via Telnet and SSH from arbitrary IP addresses.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A physically local user can read the start-up configuration.

CVE-2012-0363.title: Cisco Small Business SRP500 Series Bugs Let Remote Users Upload Files and Remote Authenticated Users Inject Commands
CVE-2012-0363.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Small Business SRP 500 Series devices. A remote authenticated user can execute commands on the target system. A remote user can upload files to the target system. A remote user can upload an arbitrary configuration file.The Services Ready Platform Configuration Utility web interface contains several vulnerabilities.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted URL to execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system [CVE-2012-0363]. The commands will run with root privileges. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtt46871 to this vulnerability.A remote user can upload an arbitrary configuration file [CVE-2012-0364]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtw55495 to this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Local TFTP file upload application to upload arbitrary files to be installed on the target device [CVE-2012-0365]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtw56009 to this vulnerability.The models are affected when running firmware prior to version 1.1.26: * Cisco SRP 521W * Cisco SRP 526W * Cisco SRP 527WThe following models are affected when running firmware prior to version 1.2.4: * Cisco SRP 521W-U * Cisco SRP 526W-U * Cisco SRP 527W-U * Cisco SRP 541W * Cisco SRP 546W * Cisco SRP 547WMichal Sajdak of Securitum, Poland reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0363.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary operating system commands with root privileges on the target device.A remote user can upload files to the target system.A remote user can upload an arbitrary configuration file.

CVE-2012-0364.title: Cisco Small Business SRP500 Series Bugs Let Remote Users Upload Files and Remote Authenticated Users Inject Commands
CVE-2012-0364.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Small Business SRP 500 Series devices. A remote authenticated user can execute commands on the target system. A remote user can upload files to the target system. The commands will run with root privileges. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtt46871 to this vulnerability.A remote user can upload an arbitrary configuration file [CVE-2012-0364]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtw55495 to this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Local TFTP file upload application to upload arbitrary files to be installed on the target device [CVE-2012-0365]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtw56009 to this vulnerability.The models are affected when running firmware prior to version 1.1.26: * Cisco SRP 521W * Cisco SRP 526W * Cisco SRP 527WThe following models are affected when running firmware prior to version 1.2.4: * Cisco SRP 521W-U * Cisco SRP 526W-U * Cisco SRP 527W-U * Cisco SRP 541W * Cisco SRP 546W * Cisco SRP 547WMichal Sajdak of Securitum, Poland reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-0364.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary operating system commands with root privileges on the target device.A remote user can upload files to the target system.A remote user can upload an arbitrary configuration file.

CVE-2012-0365.title: Cisco Small Business SRP500 Series Bugs Let Remote Users Upload Files and Remote Authenticated Users Inject Commands

A remote user can upload files to the target system.
