The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Qualys Vulnerability & Malware Research Labs (VMRL) and Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs each reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2032.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2033.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2033.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Shockwave Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Shockwave content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Rodrigo Rubira Branco of Qualys Vulnerability & Malware Research Labs (VMRL) and Honggang Ren of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs each reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2033.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2042.title: Adobe Illustrator Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2042.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Illustrator. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Felipe Andres Manzano (via the iSIGHT Partners Global Vulnerability Partnership), Justin Kim from Microsoft Malware Protection Center (MMPC) and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR), and Tielei Wang, Georgia Tech Information Security Center, (via Secunia SVCRP) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2042.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2098.title: Apache Commons Compress BZip2CompressorOutputStream() Sorting Algorithm Lets Remote or Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2098.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Commons Compress. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can supply specially crafted data to be processed by the BZip2CompressorOutputStream() function to cause the target application or service to consume excessive processing resources.Apache Ant versions 1.5 through 1.8.3 are also affected.The vendor was notified on April 12, 2012.David Jorm of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2098.extra: A remote or local user can cause target application or service to consume excessive processing resources.

CVE-2012-2110.title: OpenSSL asn1_d2i_read_bio() Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2110.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the target application using OpenSSL to potentially trigger a heap overflow in the asn1_d2i_read_bio() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Applications that use ASN.1 BIO or FILE based functions to read untrusted DER format data are affected. The d2i_*_bio and d2i_*_fp type of functions are affected.Applications that use the memory based ASN1 functions (e.g., d2i_X509, d2i_PKCS12 etc) are not affected.The SSL/TLS code is not affected.Applications using only the PEM routines are not affected.S/MIME and CMS applications that use the built-in MIME parser SMIME_read_PKCS7 and SMIME_read_CMS functions are affected.Tavis Ormandy, Google Security Team, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2110.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-2111.title: Samba Local Security Authority Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2111.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote authenticated user can modify user privileges on the target system.Security checks are not properly applied to the CreateAccount, OpenAccount, AddAccountRights, and RemoveAccountRights RPC calls. A remote authenticated user can connect to the Local Security Authority (LSA) and modify the privileges database.A remote authenticated user can grant themselves the "take ownership" privilege and then change the ownership of a file or directories on the target system.Ivano Cristofolini reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2111.extra: A remote authenticated user can modify Samba user privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-2121.title: Linux Kernel KVM Memory Slot Management Flaw Lets Local Guest Users Deny Service on the Guest Operating System
CVE-2012-2121.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system with privileges to hotunplug and hotplug certain devices can trigger a KVM memory slot and iommu management error to cause the host system to crash.
CVE-2012-2121.extra: A local privileged user on the guest operating system can cause the target host system to crash.

CVE-2012-2122.title: MySQL memcmp() Comparison Error Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2012-2122.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote user can bypass authentication.A remote user can trigger a flaw in comparing authentication data to bypass authentication.The vendor indicates that many builds are not affected.Versions compiled with a memcmp() function that can return an arbitrary integer (outside of -128 .. 127 range) are affected.
CVE-2012-2122.extra: A remote user can access the database without authenticating.

CVE-2012-2123.title: Linux Kernel fcap Lets Local Users Bypass Personality Flag Restrictions
CVE-2012-2123.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Kernel. A local user may be able to bypass access restrictions.If an application is made privileged via file system capabilities, certain personality flags are not properly cleared. A local user may be able to exploit this to bypass the restrictions.Steve Grubb reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2123.extra: A local user may be able to bypass access restrictions.

CVE-2012-2131.title: OpenSSL asn1_d2i_read_bio() Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2131.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the target application using OpenSSL to potentially trigger a heap overflow in the asn1_d2i_read_bio() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Applications that use ASN.1 BIO or FILE based functions to read untrusted DER format data are affected. The d2i_*_bio and d2i_*_fp type of functions are affected.Applications that use the memory based ASN1 functions (e.g., d2i_X509, d2i_PKCS12 etc) are not affected.The SSL/TLS code is not affected.Applications using only the PEM routines are not affected.S/MIME and CMS applications that use the built-in MIME parser SMIME_read_PKCS7 and SMIME_read_CMS functions are affected.Tavis Ormandy, Google Security Team, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2131.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-2143.title: FreeBSD crypt(3) Hash Generation Error May Generate Incorrect Hashes
CVE-2012-2143.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. The system may generate incorrect hashes.When the crypt(3) system call is hashing data that contains a character with only the most significant bit set (0x80), that character and all subsequent characters are ignored.
CVE-2012-2143.extra: The system may generate incorrect hashes.

CVE-2012-2149.title: OpenOffice.org WordPerfect Library Memory Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2149.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Wordperfect WPD-format document that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory overwrite flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Kestutis Gudinavicius of SEC Consult Unternehmensberatung GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2149.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2151.title: SPIP Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Other Unspecified Attacks
CVE-2012-2151.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in SPIP. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. The impact of some vulnerabilities was not disclosed.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the SPIP software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.No details on other vulnerabilities were provided.Guillaume Farner, Arnault Pachot, Silvere Cainaud, Maxime Pelletier, Antoine Cervoise, and Christophe Imberti reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2151.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the SPIP software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The impact of some vulnerabilities was not disclosed.

CVE-2012-2176.title: Lotus Quickr for Domino ActiveX Control Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2176.body: A vulnerability was reported in Lotus Quickr for Domino. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the 'qp2.cab' ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 05D96F71-87C6-11d3-9BE4-00902742D6E0An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2012-2176.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2179.title: IBM AIX Symlink Flaw in libodm Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2179.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a symlink flaw in 'libodm.a' to overwrite files on the target system. This can be exploited to gain elevated privileges on the target system.Jakub Wartak reported this vulnerability. Tim Brown from Portcullis Computer Security Ltd provided additional information.
CVE-2012-2179.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-2192.title: IBM AIX socketpair() Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2192.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can make a specially crafted socketpair() call to cause the target system to crash.IBM has assigned APARS IV19178, IV16603, IV21128, IV21131, and IV21235 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2192.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2012-2200.title: IBM AIX Sendmail Default Configuration Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2012-2200.body: A vulnerability was reported in sendmail on IBM AIX. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.In the default configuration, a local user can place commands in their '.forward' file to cause sendmail to execute the commands with root privileges.
CVE-2012-2200.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-2210.title: Sony Bravia TV Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2012-2210.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sony Bravia TV. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target device to crash. A physical restart is required to return the device to normal operations.A demonstration exploit hping command is provided:hping -S [target] -p [port] -i u1 --floodGabriel Menezes Nunes reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2210.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.

CVE-2012-2267.title: Helix Server Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Obtain Passwords
CVE-2012-2267.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Helix Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A local user can obtain passwords.A remote user can send specially crafted authentication credentials to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-0942].A local user can obtain passwords stored in the '\Program Files\Real\Helix Server\adm_b_db\users\' file [CVE-2012-1923].A remote user can a send specially crafted DisplayString request to the SNMP master agent process on TCP port 705 to cause the target service to terminate [CVE-2012-2268].A remote user can establish and then immediately close a connection to the SNMP master agent process on TCP port 705 to cause the service to terminate [CVE-2012-2267].Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-1984]. The code will originate from the site running the Helix Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated administrative user can submit a specially crafted URL to consume excessive stack memory and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2012-1985].Dmitriy Pletnev of Secunia Research, Derek Brown of TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, and Tom Gallagher at Microsoft and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2267.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain passwords.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Helix Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2268.title: Helix Server Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Obtain Passwords
CVE-2012-2268.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Helix Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A local user can obtain passwords.A remote user can send specially crafted authentication credentials to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-0942].A local user can obtain passwords stored in the '\Program Files\Real\Helix Server\adm_b_db\users\' file [CVE-2012-1923].A remote user can a send specially crafted DisplayString request to the SNMP master agent process on TCP port 705 to cause the target service to terminate [CVE-2012-2268].A remote user can establish and then immediately close a connection to the SNMP master agent process on TCP port 705 to cause the service to terminate [CVE-2012-2267].Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2012-1984]. The code will originate from the site running the Helix Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated administrative user can submit a specially crafted URL to consume excessive stack memory and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2012-1985].Dmitriy Pletnev of Secunia Research, Derek Brown of TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, and Tom Gallagher at Microsoft and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2268.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can obtain passwords.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Helix Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2273.title: Comodo Internet Security PE File Processing Bug Lets Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2273.body: A vulnerability was reported in Comodo Internet Security. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote or local user can create a specially crafted PE file that, when loaded into memory on the target system, will cause the target system to crash.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2012.BOClean Anti malware may also be affected.Ange Albertini reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2273.extra: A remote or local user can cause the target system to crash when a file is loaded into memory.

CVE-2012-2276.title: EMC Documentum Information Rights Management Server Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2276.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Information Rights Management Server. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger a NULL pointer dereference and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2012-2276].A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to cause repetitive "batch begin untethered" calls that will make the server become unavailable [CVE-2012-2277].
CVE-2012-2276.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash or become unavailable.

CVE-2012-2277.title: EMC Documentum Information Rights Management Server Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2277.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Information Rights Management Server. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger a NULL pointer dereference and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2012-2276].A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to cause repetitive "batch begin untethered" calls that will make the server become unavailable [CVE-2012-2277].
CVE-2012-2277.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash or become unavailable.

CVE-2012-2281.title: RSA Access Manager Session Replay Flaw Lets Remote Users Access the System
CVE-2012-2281.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Access Manager. A remote user can gain access to the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the logout process and replay session credentials to gain access to the target system.
CVE-2012-2281.extra: A remote user can access the target system.

CVE-2012-2282.title: EMC Celerra/VNX/VNXe Access Control Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Access Files/Directories
CVE-2012-2282.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Celerra/VNX/VNXe. A remote authenticated user can access files and directories on the target file system.A remote authenticated user can bypass access controls an gain unauthorized access to distributed files and directories on the target NFS file system.The following product versions are affected:EMC Celerra Network Server versions 6.0.36.4 through 6.0.60.2EMC VNX versions 7.0.12.0 through 7.0.53.1EMC VNXe 2.0 (including SP1, SP2, and SP3)EMC VNXe MR1 (including SP1, SP2, SP3, and SP3.1) EMC VNXe MR2 (including SP0.1)
CVE-2012-2282.extra: A remote authenticated user can access files and directories on the target system.

CVE-2012-2285.title: EMC Cloud Tiering Appliance Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Gain Administrative Access
CVE-2012-2285.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Cloud Tiering Appliance. A remote user can gain administrative access on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted file during the authentication process to gain administrative privileges on the target device.EMC Cloud Tiering Appliance Virtual Edition is also affected.shiftnumbers.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2285.extra: A remote user can gain administrative access on the target system.

CVE-2012-2289.title: EMC ApplicationXtender Lets Remote Users Upload Files to Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2289.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC ApplicationXtender. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to execute arbitrary code on the target system.No details were provided.EMC ApplicationXtender Web Access .NET versions 6.5 P1 and prior are also affected.Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2012-2289.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-2290.title: EMC NetWorker Module for Microsoft Applications Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Users Obtain Passwords
CVE-2012-2290.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC NetWorker Module for Microsoft Applications. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain passwords.The communications channel between the EMC NetWorker Module (NMM) components is not protected certain circumstances [CVE-2012-2290]. A remote user can connect to the target NNM client via TCP and send a specially crafted message to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The system stores administrator credentials in clear text after installing or upgrading EMC NetWorker Module for Microsoft Applications on a Microsoft Exchange Server [CVE-2012-2284]. A local user can obtain the credentials. NMM is only affected when using Exchange Server.EMC has assigned identifiers NW140018, NW142106, and NW141316 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2290.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain the administrator password.

CVE-2012-2311.title: PHP Command Parameter Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2311.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can submit a specially crafted request containing a command line switch to cause the php-cgi binary to execute the parameter.Systems where PHP is used in a CGI-based setup (e.g., Apache mod_cgi) may be affected.Systems using Apache mod_php or nginx with php-fpm are not affected.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/index.php?-sThis vulnerability is being actively exploited.The original advisory is available at:http://eindbazen.net/2012/05/php-cgi-advisory-cve-2012-1823/De Eindbazen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2311.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-2333.title: OpenSSL Invalid TLS/DTLS Record Processing Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2333.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted TLS/DTLS records to cause denial of service conditions.The CBC mode ciphersuites in TLS 1.1, 1.2 and DTLS are affectedBoth clients and servers are affected.DTLS is affected in all versions of OpenSSL.TLS is affected in OpenSSL version 1.0.1 and later.Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2333.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2012-2334.title: OpenOffice.org PowerPoint Processing Flaw May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2334.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PowerPoint file with a specially crafted graphics record that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory error or integer overflow and cause the target user's application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.The vulnerability resides in 'filter/source/msfilter/msdffimp.cxx'.Sven Jacobias reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2334.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2337.title: Sudo Netmask Error Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Host Access Controls
CVE-2012-2337.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sudo. A remote authenticated user can bypass host access controls.A remote authenticated user listed in the sudoers file (or sudoers LDAP data) and granted access to commands on hosts on one or more IPv4 networks (using IP network matching) may be able to execute a command from an unauthorized host.
CVE-2012-2337.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass host access controls.

CVE-2012-2376.title: PHP Windows com_print_typeinfo() Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2376.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the web service to run specially crafted PHP code to trigger a buffer overflow in the com_print_typeinfo() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user with PHP upload capabilities may also be able to exploit this flaw.Only Windows-based systems are affected.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/18861/Condis and 0in (Maksymilian Motyl) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2376.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-2388.title: strongSwan gmp Plugin Signature Verification Flaw Lets Remote Users Authenticate As Arbitrary Users
CVE-2012-2388.body: A vulnerability was reported in strongSwan. A remote user can authenticate as an arbitrary user.When the gmp plugin is used for RSA signature verification, a remote user can supply an empty or zeroed signature to authenticate as an arbitrary user.IKEv1 and IKEv2 authentication is affected.The Codenomicon CROSS project reported this vulnerability via CERT-FI.
CVE-2012-2388.extra: A remote user can authenticate as an arbitrary user.

CVE-2012-2392.title: Wireshark Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2392.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted ANSI MAP, ASF, BACapp, Bluetooth HCI, IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.3, LTP, and R3 data to cause Wireshark to hang or enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-2392, CVE-2012-3825, CVE-2012-3826]. Laurent Butti reported these vulnerabilities.A remote user can cause the DIAMETER dissector to crash [CVE-2012-2393].A remote user can trigger a memory error on SPARC or Itanium processors and cause Wireshark to crash [CVE-2012-2394]. Klaus Heckelmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2392.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to hang or crash.

CVE-2012-2393.title: Wireshark Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2393.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted ANSI MAP, ASF, BACapp, Bluetooth HCI, IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.3, LTP, and R3 data to cause Wireshark to hang or enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-2392, CVE-2012-3825, CVE-2012-3826]. Laurent Butti reported these vulnerabilities.A remote user can cause the DIAMETER dissector to crash [CVE-2012-2393].A remote user can trigger a memory error on SPARC or Itanium processors and cause Wireshark to crash [CVE-2012-2394]. Klaus Heckelmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2393.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to hang or crash.

CVE-2012-2394.title: Wireshark Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2394.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted ANSI MAP, ASF, BACapp, Bluetooth HCI, IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.3, LTP, and R3 data to cause Wireshark to hang or enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-2392, CVE-2012-3825, CVE-2012-3826]. Laurent Butti reported these vulnerabilities.A remote user can cause the DIAMETER dissector to crash [CVE-2012-2393].A remote user can trigger a memory error on SPARC or Itanium processors and cause Wireshark to crash [CVE-2012-2394]. Klaus Heckelmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2394.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to hang or crash.

CVE-2012-2411.title: RealPlayer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2411.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted MP4 file can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2012-1904]. Craig Young of nCircle reported this vulnerability.An ASMRuleBook parsing flaw can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-2406]. Tom Gallagher reported this vulnerability via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure.A buffer overflw in the RealJukebox media parser can cause code execution [CVE-2012-2411]. Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2411.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2414.title: Asterisk Manager Interface Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Shell Commands
CVE-2012-2414.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote authenticated user on the Asterisk Manager interface can execute arbitrary shell commands.A remote authenticated user on the Asterisk Manager interface can bypass a security check and execute shell commands.The MixMonitor application with the originate action or either the GetVar or Status manager actions in combination with the SHELL and EVAL functions can be used to exploit this flaw.The vendor was notified on February 23, 2011.David Woolley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2414.extra: A remote authenticated user on the Asterisk Manager interface can execute arbitrary shell commands.

CVE-2012-2415.title: Asterisk Heap Overflow in Skinny Channel Driver Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2415.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted KEYPAD_BUTTON_MESSAGE event data to trigger a heap overflow in the Skinny Channel Driver and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Russell Bryant reported this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2012.
CVE-2012-2415.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-2416.title: Asterisk SIP Channel Driver Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2416.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP UPDATE request to cause Asterisk to perform a connected line update with no associated channel and crash.The vendor was notified on April 16, 2012.Thomas Arimont reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2416.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause Asterisk to crash.

CVE-2012-2448.title: VMware ESX/ESXi NFS Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and RPC Pointer Errors Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2448.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in VMware ESX/ESXi. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on the guest operating system can exploit a flaw in the handler function for RPC commands to cause the VMX process to crash or execute arbitrary code [CVE-2012-1516, CVE-2012-1517].ESXi 5.0 is not affected.Derek Soeder of Ridgeway Internet Security, L.L.C. reported the vulnerabilities listed above.A remote user can send specially crafted NFS traffic to trigger a memory overwrite and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-2448].
CVE-2012-2448.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target system to crash or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2012-2449.title: VMware ESX/ESXi Virtual Floppy Configuration and SCSI Device Registration Flaws Let Local Guest Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2449.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESX/ESXi. A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on the guest operating system can exploit a flaw in the virtual floppy configuration to perform an out-of-bounds memory write and cause the VMX process to crash or execute arbitrary code on the host [CVE-2012-2449].A local user on the guest operating system can exploit a flaw in SCSI device registration to perform an unchecked memory write and cause the VMX process to crash or execute arbitrary code on the host [CVE-2012-2450].
CVE-2012-2449.extra: A local user can cause the VMX process to crash or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2012-2488.title: Cisco IOS XR Packet Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service on Certain Devices
CVE-2012-2488.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted packet to the target device to cause the route processor to be unable to transmit route processor-based protocol packets to the fabric.IP traffic transiting the device cannot trigger the flaw.Cisco IOS XR is affected on the Cisco 9000 Series Aggregation Services Routers (ASR) Route Switch Processor (RSP440) and the Cisco Carrier Routing System (CRS) Performance Route Processor (PRP).Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCty94537 (ASR 9000) and CSCtz62593 (CRS) to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2488.extra: A remote user can cause the route processor to be unable to transmit packets.

CVE-2012-2511.title: SAP NetWeaver Dispatcher Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2012-2511.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in SAP NetWeaver Dispatcher. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted SAP Diag packets to trigger a buffer overflow in the Dispatcher service and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The DiagTraceR3Info function is affected [CVE-2012-2611].A remote user can also cause the target service to crash.The DiagTraceHex function is affected [CVE-2012-2612].The DiagTraceAtoms function is affected [CVE-2012-2511].The DiagTraceStreamI function is affected [CVE-2012-2512].The Diaginput function is affected [CVE-2012-2513].The DiagiEventSource function is affected [CVE-2012-2514].The vendor was notified on January 24, 2012.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/sap-netweaver-dispatcher-multiple-vulnerabilitiesMartin Gallo from Core Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2511.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The DiagTraceR3Info function is affected [CVE-2012-2611].A remote user can also cause the target service to crash.The DiagTraceHex function is affected [CVE-2012-2612].The DiagTraceAtoms function is affected [CVE-2012-2511].The DiagTraceStreamI function is affected [CVE-2012-2512].The Diaginput function is affected [CVE-2012-2513].The DiagiEventSource function is affected [CVE-2012-2514].The vendor was notified on January 24, 2012.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/sap-netweaver-dispatcher-multiple-vulnerabilitiesMartin Gallo from Core Security reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2012-2520.title: Microsoft Lync HTML Sanitizer Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-2520.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Lync. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The HTML sanitizer does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft Lync software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access potentially sensitive information.Drew Hintz of Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2520.extra: A remote user can access potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-2520.title: Microsoft Office InfoPath HTML Sanitizer Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-2520.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office InfoPath. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The HTML sanitizer does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft Office InfoPath software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Drew Hintz of Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2520.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft Office InfoPath software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2520.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office Communicator. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft Office Communicator software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access potentially sensitive information.Drew Hintz of Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2520.extra: A remote user can access potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-2520.title: Microsoft SharePoint HTML Sanitizer Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-2520.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The HTML sanitizer does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. CVE-2012-2530.title: Windows Kernel Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Users Obtain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2530.body: Several vulnerabilities was reported in the Windows Kernel. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges.A remote user can create a specially crafted TrueType font file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-2897]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Eetu Luodemaa and Joni Vahamaki of Documill (via the Chromium Security Rewards Program) reported this vulnerability.A local user can trigger a use-after-free memory error in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2012-2530, CVE-2012-2553].Matthew Jurczyk of Google Inc reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2530.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges.

CVE-2012-2543.title: Microsoft Excel Buffer Overflow, Memory Corruption, and Use-After-Free Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2543.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in SerAuxErrBar() and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-1885]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-1886]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an invalid length use-after-free and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-1887]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-2543]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Sean Larsson (via iDefense VCP), an anonymous researcher (via iDefense VCP), and an anonymous researcher (via HP TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2543.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2546.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Use-After-Free Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2546.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The onMove() method is affected [CVE-2012-1529]. An anonymous researcher (via VeriSign iDefense Labs) reported this vulnerability.An Event Listener is affected [CVE-2012-2546]. Rosario Valotta reported this vulnerability.A Layout object is affected [CVE-2012-2548]. Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.The cloneNode() method is affected [CVE-2012-2557]. An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.Internet 10 is not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2546.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2548.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Use-After-Free Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The onMove() method is affected [CVE-2012-1529]. Rosario Valotta reported this vulnerability.A Layout object is affected [CVE-2012-2548]. Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.The cloneNode() method is affected [CVE-2012-2557]. An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.Internet 10 is not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2548.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2550.title: Microsoft Works Heap Corruption Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2550.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Works. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Word file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2012-2550.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A local user can obtain elevated privileges.A remote user can create a specially crafted TrueType font file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-2897]. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The onMove() method is affected [CVE-2012-1529]. An anonymous researcher (via VeriSign iDefense Labs) reported this vulnerability.An Event Listener is affected [CVE-2012-2546]. Rosario Valotta reported this vulnerability.A Layout object is affected [CVE-2012-2548]. Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.The cloneNode() method is affected [CVE-2012-2557]. CVE-2012-2561.title: HP Business Service Management Default JBOSS Configuration Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2561.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Business Service Management. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can upload a jsp-shell as a '.war' file to the JBOSS application server via TCP ports 4444, 1098, or 1099 and have the server deploy it as a service to execute the shell with System privileges.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/859230David Elze of Daimler TSS reported this vulnerability via US-CERT.
CVE-2012-2561.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-2584.title: Alt-N MDaemon Input Validation Flaw in Processing CSS/HTML Properties Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-2584.body: A vulnerability was reported in Alt-N MDaemon. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can send a specially crafted e-mail message that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the MDaemon software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Certain CSS properties and HTML attributes are affected.The original advisory, including a demonstration exploit, is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/20357/loneferret of Offensive Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2584.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the MDaemon software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2601.title: Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold Input Validation Flaw in 'WrVMwareHostList.asp' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2012-2601.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'WrVMwareHostList.asp' script does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/20035/muts reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2601.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-2625.title: Xen PV Bootloader Bug Lets Local Guest Users Crash the System
CVE-2012-2625.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest virtual machine can cause denial of service conditions.A local user on the guest virtual machine can load a specially crafted bzip2 or lzma compressed kernel image to trigger a flaw in the pv bootloader and cause the target system to crash.Xinli Niu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2625.extra: A local user on the guest virtual machine can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2012-2662.title: Red Hat Certificate System Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2012-2662.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Certificate System. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can revoke the CA certificate.The Agent and End Entity pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-2662]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Certificate Manager web interface does not properly check certificate revocation requests [CVE-2012-3367]. A remote authenticated agent with permissions to perform revocations of end entity certificates can revoke the Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.
CVE-2012-2662.extra: A remote authenticated user can revoke the CA certificate.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2665.title: OpenOffice.org XML Manifest Encryption Handling Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2665.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Open Document Format for Office Applications (ODF) format file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the XML manifest encryption handling code and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Timo Warns of PRE-CERT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2665.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2665.title: LibreOffice XML Manifest Encryption Handling Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-2665.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibreOffice. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Open Document Format for Office Applications (ODF) format file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the XML manifest encryption handling codeand execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Timo Warns of PRE-CERT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2665.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-2668.title: OpenLDAP May Ignore TLSCipherSuite Setting in Some Cases
CVE-2012-2668.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenLDAP. The system may use a weaker cipher suite than specified.When the Mozilla NSS backend is used, the OpenLDAP software ignores the TLSCipherSuite setting and instead uses the default cipher suite, which may contain some weak ciphers.The vulnerability resides in 'libraries/libldap/tls_m.c'.Tim Strobell reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2668.extra: The system may use weaker ciphers than specified in the configuration file.

CVE-2012-2679.title: Red Hat Network Configuration Client Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Local Users
CVE-2012-2679.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Network Configuration Client. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The 'rhncfg-client' tool configures the '/var/log/rhncfg-actions' file with world-readable permissions. A local user can view the contents of the file.Paul Wouters of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2679.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information in the '/var/log/rhncfg-actions' file.

CVE-2012-2696.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Authenticated Users Access Data
CVE-2012-2696.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote authenticated user can access restricted data on the target system. A remote user can conduct man-in-the-middle attacks to gain root access.Red Hat Enterprise Linux hosts are not properly added to the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization (RHEV) environment [CVE-2012-0860]. A local user on the host to be added to the RHEV environment can place specially crafted files in the '/tmp' directory to gain elevated privileges.The system does not properly validate SSL certificates for HTTPS connections when Python configuration scripts are downloaded [CVE-2012-0861]. A remote user on the local network can conduct a man-in-the-middle attack to potentially gain root access on the host being added to the RHEV environment.The system does not properly lock the screen on a virtual machine between Simple Protocol for Independent Computing Environments (SPICE) session [CVE-2011-4316]. A local user on a virtual machine may be able to gain access to another user's unlocked desktop session.The system does not properly wipe-after-delete when moving disks between storage domains [CVE-2012-5516]. A user may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.The system back end does not properly check the privileges of users making requests via the SOAP and GWT APIs. A remote authenticated user can access restricted data [CVE-2012-2696].Red Hat reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2696.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can access restricted data on the target system.A remote user can conduct man-in-the-middle attacks to gain root access.

CVE-2012-2698.title: MediaWiki Input Validation Flaw in 'uselang' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-2698.body: A vulnerability was reported in MediaWiki. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'uselang' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the MediaWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Chris Steipp and Formafix reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2698.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the MediaWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2733.title: Apache Tomcat Header Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2733.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted request with large headers to trigger an OutOfMemoryError in the HTTP NIO connector.Josh Spiewak reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2733.extra: A remote user can cause excessive memory consumption on the target system.

CVE-2012-2740.title: PHPlist Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and SQL Injection Attacks
CVE-2012-2740.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in PHPlist. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The 'public_html/lists/admin' pages do not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'sortby' parameter [CVE-2012-2740]. A remote authenticated administrative user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The 'public_html/lists/admin' pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'num' parameter before displaying the input [CVE-2012-2741]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the PHPlist software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/18639/Gjoko 'LiquidWorm' Krstic reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2740.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the PHPlist software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated administrative user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-2741.title: PHPlist Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and SQL Injection Attacks
CVE-2012-2741.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in PHPlist. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The 'public_html/lists/admin' pages do not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'sortby' parameter [CVE-2012-2740]. A remote authenticated administrative user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The 'public_html/lists/admin' pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'num' parameter before displaying the input [CVE-2012-2741]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the PHPlist software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/18639/Gjoko 'LiquidWorm' Krstic reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2741.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the PHPlist software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated administrative user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-2745.title: Linux Kernel Session Keyring Bug in copy_creds() Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2745.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can exploit a flaw in the copy_creds() function in the management of replacement session keyrings and cause the target system to crash.
CVE-2012-2745.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2012-2762.title: Serendipity Input Validation Flaw in 'functions_trackbacks.inc.php' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2012-2762.body: A vulnerability was reported in Serendipity. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'include/functions_trackbacks.inc.php' script does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor was notified on May 16, 2012.The original advisory is available at:https://www.htbridge.com/advisory/HTB23092High-Tech Bridge SA Security Research Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2762.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-2897.title: Windows Kernel Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Users Obtain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-2897.body: Several vulnerabilities was reported in the Windows Kernel. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges.A remote user can create a specially crafted TrueType font file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-2897]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Eetu Luodemaa and Joni Vahamaki of Documill (via the Chromium Security Rewards Program) reported this vulnerability.A local user can trigger a use-after-free memory error in the Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2012-2530, CVE-2012-2553].Matthew Jurczyk of Google Inc reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-2897.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges.

CVE-2012-2948.title: Asterisk Null Pointer Dereference in SCCP Channel Driver Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-2948.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user with a valid SCCP ID can close a connection in certain cases to cause the target server to crash.Christoph Hebeisen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2948.extra: A remote user can cause the target server to crash.

CVE-2012-2974.title: SMC SMC8024L2 Switch Web Interface Discloses Configuration Data to Remote Users
CVE-2012-2974.body: A vulnerability was reported in the SMC SMC8024L2 Switch. A remote user can obtain configuration data.A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to obtain configuration pages.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/377915Elio Torrisi reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2974.extra: A remote user can obtain configuration data.

CVE-2012-2981.title: Webmin Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code and View Arbitrary Files
CVE-2012-2981.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Webmin. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary Perl commands on the target system [CVE-2012-2981].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in '/file/show.cgi' to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the target system [CVE-2012-2982].A remote user (or possibly a remote authenticated user) can exploit a flaw in 'edit_html.cgi' to view arbitrary files with root privileges [CVE-2012-2983].American Information Security Group reported these vulnerabilities via US-CERT (http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/788478).
CVE-2012-2981.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2012-2983.title: Webmin Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code and View Arbitrary Files
CVE-2012-2983.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Webmin. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary Perl commands on the target system [CVE-2012-2981].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in '/file/show.cgi' to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the target system [CVE-2012-2982].A remote user (or possibly a remote authenticated user) can exploit a flaw in 'edit_html.cgi' to view arbitrary files with root privileges [CVE-2012-2983].American Information Security Group reported these vulnerabilities via US-CERT (http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/788478).
CVE-2012-2983.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2012-2993.title: Windows Phone Certificate Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Spoof Secure E-mail Servers
CVE-2012-2993.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Phone 7. A remote user can spoof secure e-mail servers in certain cases.The software does not validate Common Name (CN) values of mail server SSL certificates when sending or retrieving email via POP3, IMAP, and SMTP.A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack between the target e-mail server and the target phone device can spoof the secure e-mail server to access the encrypted session.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/389795
CVE-2012-2993.extra: A remote user can spoof secure e-mail servers in certain cases.

CVE-2012-2995.title: Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2012-2995.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting and cross-site request forgery attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-2995]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the InterScan Messaging Security software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'wrsApprovedURL' parameter in 'addRuleAttrWrsApproveUrl.imss' and the 'src' parameter in 'initUpdSchPage.imss' is affected.The 'saveAccountSubTab.imss' script does not properly validate user-supplied data [CVE-2012-2996]. A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on August 10, 2012.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/471364Tom Gregory reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2995.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the InterScan Messaging Security software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2996.title: Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2012-2996.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting and cross-site request forgery attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-2995]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the InterScan Messaging Security software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'wrsApprovedURL' parameter in 'addRuleAttrWrsApproveUrl.imss' and the 'src' parameter in 'initUpdSchPage.imss' is affected.The 'saveAccountSubTab.imss' script does not properly validate user-supplied data [CVE-2012-2996]. A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on August 10, 2012.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/471364Tom Gregory reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2996.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the InterScan Messaging Security software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-2998.title: Trend Micro Control Manager Input Validation Flaw in Ad Hoc Query Module Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2012-2998.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro Control Manager. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The ad hoc query module does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.Tom Gregory reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-2998.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-3132.title: Oracle Database �INDEXTYPE CTXSYS.CONTEXT� Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-3132.body: A vulnerability was reported in Oracle Database. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user with 'Create Table' privileges can send specially crafted data to gain 'SYS' privileges.Versions 11.2.0.2 and 11.2.0.3 are not affected on systems that have the July 2012 Critical Patch Update.Oracle Fusion Middleware, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle E-Business Suite include the affected Oracle Database Server component and may be vulnerable.This vulnerability was reported at Black Hat USA 2012 Briefings.
CVE-2012-3132.extra: A remote authenticated user with 'Create Table' privileges can gain 'SYS' privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-3248.title: HP Fortify Software Security Center Discloses Information to Remote Users
CVE-2012-3248.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Fortify Software Security Center. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.No details were provided.Luca Carettoni reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3248.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2012-3272.title: HP LaserJet and Color LaserJet Printer Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-3272.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP LaserJet and Color LaserJet Printers. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the printer interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The following versions are affected:HP Color LaserJet CM3530HP Color LaserJet CM6030HP Color LaserJet CM6040HP Color LaserJet CP3525HP Color LaserJet CP4025HP Color LaserJet CP4525HP Color LaserJet CP6015LaserJet P3015LaserJet P4014LaserJet P4015LaserJet P4515Dominic Sim of KPMG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3272.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the HP Printer interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3294.title: IBM WebSphere MQ File Transfer Edition Bug Permits Cross-Site Requeset Forgery Attacks
CVE-2012-3294.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere MQ File Transfer Edition. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can take actions on the target site acting as the target user.IBM WebSphere MQ Managed File Transfer is also affected.
CVE-2012-3294.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3296.title: IBM Hardware Management Console Input Validation Hole in Login Panel Help Link Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-3296.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Hardware Management Console. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Help Link on the login panel does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Hardware Management Console software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.CitiGroup, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3296.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Hardware Management Console software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3297.title: IBM Tivoli Monitoring Input Validation Flaw in Service Console Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-3297.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Monitoring. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Service Console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Tivoli Monitoring Service Console and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2012-3297.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Tivoli Monitoring software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3308.title: IBM Sametime Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-3308.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Sametime. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Sametime IM chat feature does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sametime software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.IBM has assigned SPR #KBIM8T2KWR to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3308.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sametime software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3309.title: IBM InfoSphere Guardium Bug Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2012-3309.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM InfoSphere Guardium. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by a target user, will take actions on the target site acting as the target user.Positive Technologies Positive Research Center reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3309.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3325.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
