CVE-2012-3325.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Application Server. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target application.A remote authenticated user can exploit an flaw in the validation of user credentials to bypass access restrictions and gain administrative access.Systems that have installed an Interim Fix for PM44303 are affected.
CVE-2012-3325.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges on the target application.

CVE-2012-3365.title: PHP SQLite Bug Lets Users Bypass open_basedir Restrictions
CVE-2012-3365.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote or local user can bypass security restrictions.A user can exploit an unspecified flaw in SQLite to bypass the open_basedir restrictions.
CVE-2012-3365.extra: A user can bypass the open_basedir restrictions.

CVE-2012-3367.title: Red Hat Certificate System Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2012-3367.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Certificate System. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can revoke the CA certificate.The Agent and End Entity pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-2662]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Certificate Manager web interface does not properly check certificate revocation requests [CVE-2012-3367]. A remote authenticated agent with permissions to perform revocations of end entity certificates can revoke the Certificate Authority (CA) certificate.
CVE-2012-3367.extra: A remote authenticated user can revoke the CA certificate.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3369.title: JBoss Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Hijack User Sessions or Credentials, and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-3369.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can hijack a user session in certain cases. A remote user can obtain a user's credentials in certain cases.A remote user can access the JMXInvokerHAServlet and EJBInvokerHAServlet invoker servlets by default in some profiles [CVE-2012-0874]. If security interceptor's second layer of authentication is bypassed via a misconfiguration or is disabled, a remote user can execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the Jboss server.David Jorm of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.In a non-default configuration, the CallerIdentityLoginModule may retain the password from the previous call when the remote user provides a null password [CVE-2012-3369]. A remote user may be able to hijack a previously-authenticated user's session.Carlo de Wolf of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.If no security context is provided, the SecurityAssociation.getCredential() function returns the previous credential [CVE-2012-3370]. A remote user may be able to obtain the credentials of a previously-authenticated user.Carlo de Wolf of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.The JMX Invoker may not properly restrict access to users with specific roles [CVE-2012-5478]. A remote authenticated user may be able to perform JMX operations requiring a role that they do not have.Derek Horton of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3369.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can hijack a user session in certain cases.A remote user can obtain a user's credentials in certain cases.

CVE-2012-3370.title: JBoss Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Hijack User Sessions or Credentials, and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-3370.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can hijack a user session in certain cases. A remote user can obtain a user's credentials in certain cases.A remote user can access the JMXInvokerHAServlet and EJBInvokerHAServlet invoker servlets by default in some profiles [CVE-2012-0874]. If security interceptor's second layer of authentication is bypassed via a misconfiguration or is disabled, a remote user can execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the Jboss server.David Jorm of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.In a non-default configuration, the CallerIdentityLoginModule may retain the password from the previous call when the remote user provides a null password [CVE-2012-3369]. A remote user may be able to hijack a previously-authenticated user's session.Carlo de Wolf of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.If no security context is provided, the SecurityAssociation.getCredential() function returns the previous credential [CVE-2012-3370]. A remote user may be able to obtain the credentials of a previously-authenticated user.Carlo de Wolf of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.The JMX Invoker may not properly restrict access to users with specific roles [CVE-2012-5478]. A remote authenticated user may be able to perform JMX operations requiring a role that they do not have.Derek Horton of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3370.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can hijack a user session in certain cases.A remote user can obtain a user's credentials in certain cases.

CVE-2012-3373.title: Apache Wicket Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-3373.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Wicket. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in ajax links before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Apache Wicket software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Thomas Heigl reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3373.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Apache Wicket software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-3377.title: VLC Player Buffer Overflow in Ogg_DecodePacket() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3377.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the Ogg_DecodePacket() function in 'modules/demux/ogg.c'.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure.
CVE-2012-3377.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3402.title: GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP) PSD/KiSS/GIF Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3402.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted Adobe Photoshop image file can trigger a heap overflow in the PSD plug-in [CVE-2012-3402]. Versions 2.2.13 and prior are affected. Jan Lieskovsky of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted KiSS palette file can trigger a heap overflow in the KiSS CEL file format plug-in [CVE-2012-3403]. Murray McAllister of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted GIF image file can trigger a heap overflow in the GIF plug-in [CVE-2012-3481]. Matthias Weckbecker of the SUSE Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3402.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3403.title: GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP) PSD/KiSS/GIF Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3403.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted Adobe Photoshop image file can trigger a heap overflow in the PSD plug-in [CVE-2012-3402]. Versions 2.2.13 and prior are affected. Jan Lieskovsky of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted KiSS palette file can trigger a heap overflow in the KiSS CEL file format plug-in [CVE-2012-3403]. Murray McAllister of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted GIF image file can trigger a heap overflow in the GIF plug-in [CVE-2012-3481]. Matthias Weckbecker of the SUSE Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3403.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3416.title: Condor Host-based Access Controls Can Be Bypased By Remote Users
CVE-2012-3416.body: A vulnerability was reported in Condor. A remote user can bypass host-based access controls.On systems that use host-based authentication, a remote user with control over the reverse-DNS entry of an IP host can bypass the target site's host-based authentication and perform privileged actions (e.g., ALLOW_ADMINISTRATOR or ALLOW_WRITE privileged actions).Ken Hahn and Dan Bradley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3416.extra: A remote user can bypass host-based access controls.

CVE-2012-3429.title: bind-dyndb-ldap DN Escaping Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3429.body: A vulnerability was reported in bind-dyndb-ldap. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The software does not properly escape distinguished names (DNs) for LDAP queries. A remote user can send a specially crafted request to cause the target named service to crash.
CVE-2012-3429.extra: A remote user can cause the target named service to crash.

CVE-2012-3480.title: Glibc stdlib Buffer Overflows May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-3480.body: A vulnerability was reported in Glibc. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply specially crafted data to certain stdlib functions (e.g., strtod, strtof, strtold, strtod_l) to trigger an integer overflow and resulting buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the target application.
CVE-2012-3480.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-3481.title: GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP) PSD/KiSS/GIF Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3481.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNU Image Manipulation Program (GIMP). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted Adobe Photoshop image file can trigger a heap overflow in the PSD plug-in [CVE-2012-3402]. Versions 2.2.13 and prior are affected. Jan Lieskovsky of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted KiSS palette file can trigger a heap overflow in the KiSS CEL file format plug-in [CVE-2012-3403]. Murray McAllister of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted GIF image file can trigger a heap overflow in the GIF plug-in [CVE-2012-3481]. Matthias Weckbecker of the SUSE Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3481.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3494.title: Xen set_debugreg() Hypercall Lets Local Guest Operating Systems Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Host Operating System
CVE-2012-3494.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can invoke set_debugreg() and write to reserved bits of the DR7 debug control register on x86 64-bit systems to cause the host operating system to crash.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3494.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.

CVE-2012-3495.title: Xen physdev_get_free_pirq() Error Checking Bug Lets Local Guest Users Deny Service on the Host
CVE-2012-3495.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.The physdev_get_free_pirq() function does not properly validate a function call and may use the error code as an array index. A local user on the guest operating system may be able to cause the target host operating system to crash.The vendor notes that privilege escalation is unlikely but may be possible.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3495.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.

CVE-2012-3497.title: Xen Transcendent Memory (TMEM) Multiple Flaws Lets Local Users on the Guest Operating System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host
CVE-2012-3497.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target host operating system. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.Several sub-operations of the Transcendent Memory (TMEM) hypercall do not properly validate user-supplied input or user privileges or contain other vulnerabilities.A local user on the guest operating system can overwrite hypervisor memory with arbitrary content to gain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.Systems with 'tmem' is specified on the hypervisor command line are affected.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3497.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.

CVE-2012-3498.title: Xen PHYSDEVOP_map_pirq() Index Validation Flaw Lets Local Guest Operating Systems Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Host Operating System
CVE-2012-3498.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can exploit a flaw in PHYSDEVOP_map_pirq() to cause the target host operating system to crash.A local user on the guest operating system may also be able to read hypervisor or guest operating system memory contents.Systems running HVM guests are affected. Systems running PV guests are not affected.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3498.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.A local user on the guest operating system may also be able to read hypervisor or guest operating system memory contents.

CVE-2012-3505.title: Tinyproxy Hashmap Collision Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3505.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tinyproxy. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted request with a large number of headers to consume excessive system resources on the target system.gpernot reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3505.extra: A remote user can consume excessive system resources on the target system.

CVE-2012-3510.title: Linux Kernel Use-After-Free in xacct_add_tsk() Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3510.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger a use-after-free memory error in xacct_add_tsk() to trigger a kernel panic.Alexander Peslyak reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3510.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2012-3546.title: Apache Tomcat Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Security Constraints
CVE-2012-3546.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can bypass security constraints.A remote user can send a specially crafted FORM authentication request to bypass the security constraint checks.The Tomcat security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3546.extra: A remote user can bypass security constraints.

CVE-2012-3547.title: FreeRADIUS Client Certificate Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3547.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeRADIUS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted client certificate to trigger a stack overflow in cbtls_verify() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Systems using TLS-based EAP methods (including EAP-TLS, EAP-TTLS, and PEAP) are affected.The vendor was notified on August 29, 2012.Timo Warns of PRESENSE Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3547.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-3548.title: Wireshark DRDA Dissector Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3548.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target Distributed Relational Database Architecture (DRDA) dissector to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources.
CVE-2012-3548.extra: A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.

CVE-2012-3582.title: Symantec PGP Universal Server May Disclose a User's Private Key to Remote Users
CVE-2012-3582.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec PGP Universal Server. A remote user may be able to obtain a user's private key.When a remote authenticated user completes a PGP key search request, a remote user can subsequently submit a request to potentially obtain that user's private key.Greg Ose and Mark Gould of CME Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3582.extra: A remote user may be able to obtain a user's private key.

CVE-2012-3815.title: Winlog Lite Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3815.body: A vulnerability was reported in Winlog Lite. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to port 46824 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The original advisory is available at:http://www.s3cur1ty.de/m1adv2012-001m1k3 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3815.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-3817.title: BIND DNSSEC Validation Cache Failure Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3817.body: A vulnerability was reported in BIND. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems configured for DNSSEC validation, a remote user can cause the cache of failing queries to be used before fully initialized, triggering an assertion failure.Einar Lonn of IIS.se reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3817.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2012-3825.title: Wireshark Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3825.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted ANSI MAP, ASF, BACapp, Bluetooth HCI, IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.3, LTP, and R3 data to cause Wireshark to hang or enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-2392, CVE-2012-3825, CVE-2012-3826]. Laurent Butti reported these vulnerabilities.A remote user can cause the DIAMETER dissector to crash [CVE-2012-2393].A remote user can trigger a memory error on SPARC or Itanium processors and cause Wireshark to crash [CVE-2012-2394]. Klaus Heckelmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3825.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to hang or crash.

CVE-2012-3826.title: Wireshark Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3826.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted ANSI MAP, ASF, BACapp, Bluetooth HCI, IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.3, LTP, and R3 data to cause Wireshark to hang or enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-2392, CVE-2012-3825, CVE-2012-3826]. Laurent Butti reported these vulnerabilities.A remote user can cause the DIAMETER dissector to crash [CVE-2012-2393].A remote user can trigger a memory error on SPARC or Itanium processors and cause Wireshark to crash [CVE-2012-2394]. Klaus Heckelmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3826.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to hang or crash.

CVE-2012-3935.title: Cisco Unified Presence and Jabber Extensible Communications Platform Stream Header Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3935.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Presence and Jabber Extensible Communications Platform. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) stream header to cause the target Connection Manager process to crash and restart.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtu32832 to this vulnerability.Jabber Extensible Communications Platform (XCP) is also affected, including JabberNow Appliances.
CVE-2012-3935.extra: A remote user can cause the Connection Manager process to crash, dropping connections for existing clients and preventing new clients from connecting.

CVE-2012-3936.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3936.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted WRF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCua40962, CSCtz72967, CSCtz73583, CSCua61331, CSCtz72958, and CSCtz72850 to these vulnerabilities.Beyond Security, Core Security, Codenomicon, and TELUS reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-3936.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3937.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3937.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted WRF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCua40962, CSCtz72967, CSCtz73583, CSCua61331, CSCtz72958, and CSCtz72850 to these vulnerabilities.Beyond Security, Core Security, Codenomicon, and TELUS reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-3937.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3938.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3938.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted WRF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCua40962, CSCtz72967, CSCtz73583, CSCua61331, CSCtz72958, and CSCtz72850 to these vulnerabilities.Beyond Security, Core Security, Codenomicon, and TELUS reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-3938.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3939.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3939.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted WRF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCua40962, CSCtz72967, CSCtz73583, CSCua61331, CSCtz72958, and CSCtz72850 to these vulnerabilities.Beyond Security, Core Security, Codenomicon, and TELUS reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-3939.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3940.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3940.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted WRF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCua40962, CSCtz72967, CSCtz73583, CSCua61331, CSCtz72958, and CSCtz72850 to these vulnerabilities.Beyond Security, Core Security, Codenomicon, and TELUS reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-3940.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3941.title: Cisco WebEx Player Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-3941.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco WebEx Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted WRF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCua40962, CSCtz72967, CSCtz73583, CSCua61331, CSCtz72958, and CSCtz72850 to these vulnerabilities.Beyond Security, Core Security, Codenomicon, and TELUS reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-3941.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-3950.title: Cisco IOS Intrusion Prevention System DNS Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3950.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted (but legitimate) DNS packets through the target device to cause the device to reload.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCtw55976 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3950.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-3954.title: ISC DHCP Memory Leak Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-3954.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC DHCP. A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a small memory leak. On systems that are run for a long period without re-starting or on systems handling heavy traffic, this may consume excessive memory resources on the target system.Both DHCPv6 and DHCPv4 modes are affected by at least one of the memory leaks.Glen Eustace of Massey University, New Zealand, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-3954.extra: A remote user on the local network can consume excessive memory resources on the target system.

CVE-2012-4068.title: Citrix Provisioning Services Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4068.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Provisioning Services. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted packet to trigger an unspecified flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2012-4068.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-4072.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Hardcoded SSL Certificate Lets Remote Users Spoof KVM Hosts
CVE-2012-4072.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote user can spoof KVM hosts.The system uses a hardcoded SSL certificate. A remote user can spoof a KVM host or decrypt keyboard and mouse events.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCte90327 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4072.extra: A remote user can spoof a KVM host or decrypt keyboard and mouse events.

CVE-2012-4073.title: Cisco Unified Computing System KVM Certificate Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Intercept and Modify Data
CVE-2012-4073.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote user can intercept and modify data.The KVM client does not properly validate certificates. A remote user can conduct a man-in-the-middle attacks to view or modify KVM data.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCte90332 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4073.extra: A remote user can intercept and modify data.

CVE-2012-4078.title: Cisco Unified Computing System BMC Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Additional Authentication
CVE-2012-4078.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote authenticated user can bypass additional authentication.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) and use SSH port forwarding to bypass additional authentication and gain elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg17656 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4078.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass additional authentication to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2012-4081.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Input Validation Flaw in MCTools Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4081.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply specially crafted parameters to the MCTools application to cause the MCServer application to crash.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg20734 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4081.extra: A local user can cause the MCServer application to crash.

CVE-2012-4082.title: Cisco Unified Computing System MCTools Command Injection Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-4082.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on the command line interface of a Fabric Interconnect device can supply specially crafted parameters to the MCTools application to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system with elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg20749 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4082.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-4083.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Buffer Overflow in Administrative Web Interface Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4083.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted parameter values to trigger a buffer overflow in the administrative web interface to cause administrative sessions to be terminated.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg20751 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4083.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause administrative sessions to be terminated.

CVE-2012-4085.title: Cisco Unified Computing System IPMI Flaw Discloses Valid Usernames to Remote Users
CVE-2012-4085.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI) of the Cisco Unified Computing System Blade Management Controller to determine valid usernames.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg20761 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4085.extra: A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.

CVE-2012-4087.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Input Validation Flaw in Setup Script Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2012-4087.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user can exploit an input validation flaw in the initial configuration script to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg20793 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4087.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2012-4089.title: Cisco Unified Computing System MCTools Command Injection Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-4089.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the MCTOOLS command of the fabric interconnect (FI) to execute arbitrary commands on the Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) with elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtg76239 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4089.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2012-4090.title: Cisco NX-OS Nexus 7000 Discloses Configuration Files to Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2012-4090.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user with 'network-operator' privileges can view the Cisco NX-OS configuration files.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCti09089 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4090.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain configuration files.

CVE-2012-4091.title: Cisco NX-OS RIP Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4091.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted RIPv4 or RIPv6 messages to UDP port 520 to cause the target RIP service to restart.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtj73415 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4091.extra: A remote user can cause the RIP service to restart.

CVE-2012-4093.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Manager Input Validation Flaw in Smart Call Home Feature Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4093.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply an invalid contact address for the Smart Call Home functionality to cause denial of service conditions.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtl00186 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4093.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2012-4094.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Manager Buffer Overflow in Smart Call Home Feature Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4094.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can intercept and spoof certain control messages to trigger a buffer overflow in the Smart Call Home function and cause denial of service conditions.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtl00198 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4094.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2012-4141.title: Cisco NX-OS Lets Local Users Create Arbitrary Files on the Target System
CVE-2012-4141.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the command line interface to write arbitrary scripts to arbitrary locations on the file system.An administrator may inadvertently execute the file.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCua71557 and CSCua71551 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4141.extra: A local user can create arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2012-4170.title: Adobe Photoshop Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4170.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Photoshop. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-4170]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Francis Provencher (via Secunia SVCRP) reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted SGI24LogLum-compressed TIFF image that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-0275]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Carsten Eiram, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4170.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4178.title: Symantec Web Gateway Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2012-4178.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Web Gateway. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'spywall/includes/deptUploads_data.php' script does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'groupid' parameter. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/20123@_Kc57 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4178.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-4190.title: Mozilla Firefox Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4190.body: Several vulnerabilities was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A flaw in FT2FontEntry::CreateFontEntry() may trigger code execution [CVE-2012-4190].A flaw in mozilla::net::FailDelayManager::Lookup() may trigger code execution [CVE-2012-4191].
CVE-2012-4190.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4191.title: Mozilla Firefox Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4191.body: Several vulnerabilities was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A flaw in FT2FontEntry::CreateFontEntry() may trigger code execution [CVE-2012-4190].A flaw in mozilla::net::FailDelayManager::Lookup() may trigger code execution [CVE-2012-4191].
CVE-2012-4191.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4277.title: Smarty Input Validation Flaw in {html_options} Function Plugin Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-4277.body: A vulnerability was reported in Smarty. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'function.html_options.php' script does not properly filter HTML code. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Smarty software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Applications using the {html_options} function plugin may be affected.ikehiroki at gmail reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4277.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Smarty software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-4329.title: Samsung TV Bug in Remote Control Feature Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4329.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samsung TVs. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to to TCP port 55000 cause the target device to continually crash and restart.The device must be manually reset via the service mode to return to normal operations.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/samsux_1.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4329.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to continually crash and restart.

CVE-2012-4330.title: Samsung TV Bug in Remote Control Feature Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4330.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samsung TVs. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to to TCP port 55000 cause the target device to continually crash and restart.The device must be manually reset via the service mode to return to normal operations.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/samsux_1.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4330.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to continually crash and restart.

CVE-2012-4341.title: SAP NetWeaver ABAP Flaw in 'msg_server.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4341.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP NetWeaver. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to corrupt the stack and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Packages with opcode 0x43 can trigger this flaw.The vendor was notified on October 28, 2011.e6af8de8b1d4b2b6d5ba2610cbf9cd38 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2012-4341.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-4348.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4348.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can with access to the console can execute arbitrary code. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure program.
CVE-2012-4348.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-4388.title: PHP HTTP Response Splitting Header Injection Protection Can Be Bypassed Using Carriage Return Characters
CVE-2012-4388.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote user can bypass HTTP response splitting protections.A remote user can submit specially crafted data containing carriage return characters to potentially cause the target server to return a split response. A remote user may be able to exploit this to spoof content on the target server, attempt to poison any intermediate web caches, or conduct cross-site scripting attacks.
CVE-2012-4388.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause arbitrary content to be displayed.A remote user may be able to poison any intermediate web caches with arbitrary content.

CVE-2012-4405.title: Ghostscript Integer Overflow in ICC Library Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4405.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ghostscript. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PostScript or PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow in the International Color Consortium (ICC) Format library (icclib) and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Marc Schonefeld reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4405.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4409.title: MCrypt Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4409.body: A vulnerability was reported in MCrypt. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user via the command line utility, will trigger a stack overflow in check_file_head() and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The MCrypt command line utility is affected. libmcrypt is not affected.The original advisory and demonstration exploit code is available at:http://packetstormsecurity.org/files/116268/mcrypt-2.6.8-Buffer-Overflow-Proof-Of-Concept.html_ishikawa reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4409.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4417.title: Red Hat Storage Temporary File Symlink Flaw in GlusterFS Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2012-4417.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Storage. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.GlusterFS creates temporary files non-securely. A local user can conduct a temporary file symlink attack to modify arbitary files with root privileges. This can be exploited to gain root privileges on the target system.
CVE-2012-4417.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-4431.title: Apache Tomcat Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Cross-Site Request Forgery Prevention Filter
CVE-2012-4431.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can bypass the cross-site request forgery filter.A remote user can submit a specially crafted request without a session identifier to bypass the cross-site request forgery (CSRF) prevention filter.The Tomcat security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4431.extra: A remote user can bypass the cross-site request forgery filter.

CVE-2012-4433.title: GEGL Heap Overflow in PPM Image Processing Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4433.body: A vulnerability was reported in GEGL. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted portable pixmap format (PPM) image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Murray McAllister, Red Hat Security Response Team, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4433.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4445.title: FreeBSD hostapd Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4445.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD hostapd. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The hostapd utility does not validate the length of EAP-TLS messages. A remote user can send specially crafted EAP-TLS messages to cause the target hostapd service to crash.
CVE-2012-4445.extra: A remote user can cause the target hostapd service to crash.

CVE-2012-4513.title: kdelibs Heap Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4513.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in kdelibs. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Cascading Style Sheets that, when loaded by the target user via an application that uses kdelibs, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-4512]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via an application that uses kdelibs, will trigger a heap over-read in calculating canvas dimensions for large images and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2012-4513]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2012-4513.extra: A remote user can create web content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4520.title: Django Host Header Filtering Bug Lets Remote Users Cuase Arbitrary URLs to be Displayed
CVE-2012-4520.body: A vulnerability was reported in Django. A remote user can cause arbitrary URLs to be displayed on the target user's system.The django.http.HttpRequest.get_host() function does not properly validate HTTP Host header contents. A remote user can exploit this to cause certain components of Django to display arbitrary URLs.The password-reset mechanism is affected.Other components may be affected.
CVE-2012-4520.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary URLs to be displayed to end users.

CVE-2012-4534.title: Apache Tomcat Connection Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4534.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can break the connection while reading the response to cause the target system to enter an infinite loop.Systems using the NIO connector with sendfile and HTTPS enabled are affected.Arun Neelicattu of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4534.extra: A remote user can the system to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2012-4535.title: Xen Timer Overflow Lets Local Guest Administrative Users Deny Service on the Host System
CVE-2012-4535.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the target host system.A local user with administrative privileges on the guest operating system can set a specially crafted VCPU timer value to cause the target system physical CPU to enter an infinite loop.On systems were the Xen watchdog is enabled, the target system will crash.
CVE-2012-4535.extra: A local guest administrative user can cause the target host system to hang.

CVE-2012-4538.title: Xen HVMOP_pagetable_dying() Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4538.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.The HVMOP_pagetable_dying() hypercall does not properly check the caller's pagetable state. A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.Systems running HVM guests on shadow pagetables (not HAP) are affected.
CVE-2012-4538.extra: A local user can cause the target hypervisor to crash.

CVE-2012-4539.title: Xen Grant Table Hypercall Infinite Loop Lets Local Guest Administrative Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4539.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the target host operating system.A local user with administrative privileges on the guest operating system can cause infinite loop in the compat hypercall handler.On systems with the Xen watchdog enabled, the target system will crash.Only systems with 32-bit x86 PV guests running on 64-bit Xen hypervisors are affected.
CVE-2012-4539.extra: A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause Xen to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2012-4540.title: IcedTea-Web Heap Overflow in IcedTeaScriptableJavaObject Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4540.body: A vulnerability was reported in IcedTea-Web. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the 'IcedTeaScriptableJavaObject' plugin and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in 'plugin/icedteanp/IcedTeaScriptablePluginObject.cc'.Arthur Gerkis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4540.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4543.title: Red Hat Certificate System Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2012-4543.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Certificate System. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to cause the Apache httpd web server child process to crash, which may interrupt the processing of other users' requests [CVE-2012-4555, CVE-2012-4556].Patrick Raspante and Ryan Millay of GDC4S reported theses vulnerabilities.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-4543]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2012-4543.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-4544.title: Xen Doman Builder Size Validation Bug Lets Local Guest Administrators Denial of Service
CVE-2012-4544.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the target host system.The Xen PV domain builder does not validate the size of the user-supplied kernel or ramdisk. A local administrative user on the guest operating system can supply a specially crafted kernel or ramdisk to consume all available memory on the host system.
CVE-2012-4544.extra: A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the target host system.

CVE-2012-4556.title: Red Hat Certificate System Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2012-4556.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Certificate System. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to cause the Apache httpd web server child process to crash, which may interrupt the processing of other users' requests [CVE-2012-4555, CVE-2012-4556].Patrick Raspante and Ryan Millay of GDC4S reported theses vulnerabilities.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-4543]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2012-4556.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Red Hat Certificate System software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-4576.title: FreeBSD Input Validation Flaw in Linux Compatibility Layer Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-4576.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Linux compatibility kernel module does not properly process some Linux system calls. A local user can overwrite portions of kernel memory to gain elevated privileges or trigger a kernel panic.Mateusz Guzik reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4576.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system or cause a kernel panic.

CVE-2012-4595.title: McAfee Email Gateway Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Directory Traversal Attacks
CVE-2012-4595.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee Email Gateway. A remote user can bypass authentication on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can bypass authentication and obtain a valid session ID as the admin user [CVE-2012-4595].A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system [CVE-2012-4596].The Console/Dashboard does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-4597]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the McAfee Email Gateway and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Tenable Network Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-4595.extra: A remote user can gain admin privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the McAfee Email Gateway, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2012-4596.title: McAfee Email Gateway Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Directory Traversal Attacks
CVE-2012-4596.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee Email Gateway. A remote user can bypass authentication on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can bypass authentication and obtain a valid session ID as the admin user [CVE-2012-4595].A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system [CVE-2012-4596].The Console/Dashboard does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-4597]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the McAfee Email Gateway and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Tenable Network Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-4596.extra: A remote user can gain admin privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the McAfee Email Gateway, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2012-4597.title: McAfee Email Gateway Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Directory Traversal Attacks
CVE-2012-4597.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee Email Gateway. A remote user can bypass authentication on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can bypass authentication and obtain a valid session ID as the admin user [CVE-2012-4595].A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system [CVE-2012-4596].The Console/Dashboard does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2012-4597]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the McAfee Email Gateway and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Tenable Network Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-4597.extra: A remote user can gain admin privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the McAfee Email Gateway, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2012-4603.title: Citrix XenApp Plug-in for Windows Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4603.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix XenApp Plug-in for Windows. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file on an SMB or WebDAV fileserver that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Alexey Tyurin of the Digital Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4603.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4603.title: Citrix Receiver Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4603.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Receiver. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file on an SMB or WebDAV fileserver that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Alexey Tyurin of the Digital Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4603.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4611.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise) Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-4611.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Adaptive Authentication software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2012-4611.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Adaptive Authentication software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-4614.title: EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-4614.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager. A remote user can connect to the target database. A local user can obtain passwords.The systems uses a hard-coded key to encrypt authentication credentials on the target system [CVE-2012-4615]. A local user with knowledge of the key can access the credentials.A remote user can connect to the target Network Configuration Manager (NCM) database [CVE-2012-4614].[Editor's note: This product was previously named EMC IT Operations Intelligence.)
CVE-2012-4614.extra: A remote user can connect to the target database.A local user can obtain passwords.

CVE-2012-4615.title: EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-4615.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager. A remote user can connect to the target database. A local user can obtain passwords.The systems uses a hard-coded key to encrypt authentication credentials on the target system [CVE-2012-4615]. A local user with knowledge of the key can access the credentials.A remote user can connect to the target Network Configuration Manager (NCM) database [CVE-2012-4614].[Editor's note: This product was previously named EMC IT Operations Intelligence.)
CVE-2012-4615.extra: A remote user can connect to the target database.A local user can obtain passwords.

CVE-2012-4617.title: Cisco IOS BGP Attribute Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4617.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote peer on an existing Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) session can send a specially crafted attribute to cause all BGP sessions to reset.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug IDs CSCtt35379 and CSCty58300 to this vulnerability.For Cisco IOS XR, Cisco has assigned Cisco bug IDs CSCtz63248 and CSCtz62914.Cisco NXOS is not affected.
CVE-2012-4617.extra: A remote user (BGP peer) can cause all BGP sessions on the target device to be reset.

CVE-2012-4618.title: Cisco IOS NAT Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4618.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets to trigger a flaw in the NAT SIP application layer gateway (ALG) feature and cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-4618].Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtn76183 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-4619].Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtr46123 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4618.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-4619.title: Cisco IOS NAT Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4619.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets to trigger a flaw in the NAT SIP application layer gateway (ALG) feature and cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-4618].Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtn76183 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2012-4619].Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCtr46123 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4619.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-4620.title: Cisco IOS on Cisco 10000 Series Tunneled Traffic Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4620.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IP tunneled packets to an interface on the target device to trigger a queue wedge and cause the device to be unable to process traffic on the affected interface. Transit traffic does not trigger the vulnerability.GRE/IP, IPIP, and IPv6 in IPv4 packets can trigger the flaw.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCts66808 to this vulnerability.Only the Cisco 10000 Series router is affected.
CVE-2012-4620.extra: A remote user can cause the device to be unable to process traffic on the affected interface.

CVE-2012-4621.title: Cisco IOS DHCP Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4621.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCP packet to or through the target device to cause the target device to reload.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCty96049 to this vulnerability.The vulnerability resides in the Device Sensor feature.Cisco IOS XE and IOS XR are not affected.
CVE-2012-4621.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2012-4622.title: Cisco Catalyst Switch Unspecified Packet Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4622.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Catalyst Switch 4500E Series. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted packets to or through the target device to cause the supervisor card on the target device to reload.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCty88456 to this vulnerability.The Catalyst 4500E series switch with Supervisor Engine 7L-E is affected.Cisco IOS XE Software Release 03.02.00.XO.15.0(2)XO is affected.
CVE-2012-4622.extra: A remote user can cause the supervisor card on the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-4623.title: Cisco IOS DHCPv6 Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4623.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target device to reload.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCto57723 to this vulnerability.Systems with the DHCP version 6 (DHCPv6) server feature enabled are affected.DHCP servers for IPv4 are not affected.Cisco IOS and IOS XE are affected.Cisco IOS XR Software is not affected.
CVE-2012-4623.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2012-4737.title: Asterisk Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Access Controls
CVE-2012-4737.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote authenticated user can bypass certain call access controls.A remote authenticated IAX2 user can make a call using the credentials of a peer defined in a dynamic Asterisk Realtime Architecture (ARA) backend to bypass the ACL rules set for the peer.The vendor was notified on July 27, 2012.Alan Frisch reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4737.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass certain call access controls.

CVE-2012-4739.title: Barracuda SSL VPN Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-4739.body: A vulnerability was reported in Barracuda SSL VPN. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The system does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Barracuda SSL VPN device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Benjamin Kunz Mejri from Vulnerability Research Laboratory reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4739.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Barracuda SSL VPN device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-4775.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Use-After-Free Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4775.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CFormElement class is affected [CVE-2012-1538].The CTreePos class is affected [CVE-2012-1539].The CTreeNode class is affected [CVE-2012-4775].Jose A. Vazquez of spa-s3c.blogspot.com (via VeriSign iDefense Labs) and Cheng-da Tsai (Orange), Sung-ting Tsai, and Ming-chieh Pan (Nanika) of Trend Micro reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-4775.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4776.title: Microsoft .NET Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions
CVE-2012-4776.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can bypass security restrictions.The .NET Framework does not properly validate the permissions of certain objects performing reflection [CVE-2012-1895]. A remote user can create a specially crafted a specially crafted XAML browser application (XBAP) that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted a specially crafted XBAP that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Code Access Security (CAS) restrictions to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-1896].A remote user can create a legitimate .NET application built with ADO.NET that is located in the same network directory as a specially crafted dynamic link library (DLL) file. Then, when the target user opens the .NET application, the specially crafted DLL will execute [CVE-2012-2519].The .Net Framework does not properly validate retrieved default web proxy settings [CVE-2012-4776]. A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can spoof the contents or the location of a proxy auto configuration (PAC) file to inject code into the currently running application, bypassing Code Access Security (CAS) restrictions.The software does not properly validate permissions of objects involved with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) reflection [CVE-2012-4777]. A remote user can obtain the privileges of a logged in user. A Windows .NET Framework application can bypass CAS restrictions.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported four of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-4776.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass security restrictions.

CVE-2012-4777.title: Microsoft .NET Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass Security Restrictions
CVE-2012-4777.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can bypass security restrictions.The .NET Framework does not properly validate the permissions of certain objects performing reflection [CVE-2012-1895]. A remote user can create a specially crafted a specially crafted XAML browser application (XBAP) that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.
