The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted a specially crafted XBAP that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass Code Access Security (CAS) restrictions to obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2012-1896].A remote user can create a legitimate .NET application built with ADO.NET that is located in the same network directory as a specially crafted dynamic link library (DLL) file. Then, when the target user opens the .NET application, the specially crafted DLL will execute [CVE-2012-2519].The .Net Framework does not properly validate retrieved default web proxy settings [CVE-2012-4776]. A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can spoof the contents or the location of a proxy auto configuration (PAC) file to inject code into the currently running application, bypassing Code Access Security (CAS) restrictions.The software does not properly validate permissions of objects involved with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) reflection [CVE-2012-4777]. A remote user can obtain the privileges of a logged in user. A Windows .NET Framework application can bypass CAS restrictions.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported four of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-4777.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass security restrictions.

CVE-2012-4833.title: IBM AIX fuser Command Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-4833.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.The fuser command does not properly restrict the user. A local user can invoke the command with the '-k' argument to kill a process of another user.
CVE-2012-4833.extra: A local user can kill processes belonging to other users on the target system.

CVE-2012-4857.title: IBM Informix Buffer Overflow in Processing SQL Statements Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4857.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Informix. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted SQL statements to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.IOActive Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4857.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2012-4900.title: Corel WordPerfect Pointer Dereference May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4900.body: A vulnerability was reported in Corel WordPerfect. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on September 12, 2012.High-Tech Bridge Security Research Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4900.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-4912.title: Novell GroupWise WebAccess Input Validation Flaw in HTML Email Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-4912.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise WebAccess. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied HTML email before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the GroupWise WebAccess software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Novell has assigned Novell Bug IDs 702788 and 745425 to this vulnerability.Joshua Tiago, Cirosec, reported this vulnerability via Secunia.
CVE-2012-4912.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the GroupWise software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-4953.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection CAB File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-4953.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted CAB formatted file to trigger a memory corruption error in 'dec_abi.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.Other Symantec Antivirus products may also be affected, but no other products have been disclosed by Symantec at the time of this entry.The vendor was notified on April 8, 2011.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/985625Will Dormann of the CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4953.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code with System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-4970.title: Polycom HDX Series Input Validation Flaw in Web Management Interface Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-4970.body: A vulnerability was reported in Polycom HDX Series. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Polycom HDX Series web management interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Fara Rustein of Deloitte Argentina reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-4970.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Polycom HDX Series web management interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-5050.title: VMware vCenter Operations Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-5050.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware vCenter Operations. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target authenticated administrative user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the vCenter Operations software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Alexander Minozhenko of ERPScan reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5050.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the vCenter Operations software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-5130.title: Google Chrome Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-5130.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An out-of-bounds read may occur in Skia [CVE-2012-5130]. Atte Kettunen of OUSPG reported this vulnerability.A memory corruption error may occur in the Apple OSX driver for Intel GPUs [CVE-2012-5131]. Justin Drake reported this vulnerability.A browser crash may occur when processing chunked encoding [CVE-2012-5132]. Attila Szasz reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free may occur in SVG filters [CVE-2012-5133]. miaubiz reported this vulnerability.A buffer underflow may occur in libxml [CVE-2012-5134]. Juri Aedla of the Google Chrome Security Team reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free may occur when printing [CVE-2012-5135]. Fermin Serna of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.A bad cast may occur in input element handling [CVE-2012-5136]. Inferno of the Google Chrome Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5130.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-5237.title: Wireshark HSRP/PPP/LDP Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5237.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted HSRP data to cause the target dissector to enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-5237].A remote user can send specially crafted PPP data to cause the target dissector to crash [CVE-2012-5238].A remote user can send specially crafted LDP data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target dissector to crash [CVE-2012-5240]. Laurent Butti reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5237.extra: A remote user can cause the target dissector to crash or enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2012-5240.title: Wireshark HSRP/PPP/LDP Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5240.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted HSRP data to cause the target dissector to enter an infinite loop [CVE-2012-5237].A remote user can send specially crafted PPP data to cause the target dissector to crash [CVE-2012-5238].A remote user can send specially crafted LDP data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target dissector to crash [CVE-2012-5240]. Laurent Butti reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5240.extra: A remote user can cause the target dissector to crash or enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2012-5274.title: Adobe Flash Player Buffer Overflows and Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-5274.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Buffer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-5274, CVE-2012-5275, CVE-2012-5276, CVE-2012-5277, CVE-2012-5280].Memory corruption flaws can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-5279].A security bypass flaw can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-5278].Eduardo Vela Nava, Mateusz Jurczyk, Gynvael Coldwind, and Fermin Serna of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-5274.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-5280.title: Adobe Flash Player Buffer Overflows and Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-5280.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Buffer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-5274, CVE-2012-5275, CVE-2012-5276, CVE-2012-5277, CVE-2012-5280].Memory corruption flaws can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-5279].A security bypass flaw can trigger code execution [CVE-2012-5278].Eduardo Vela Nava, Mateusz Jurczyk, Gynvael Coldwind, and Fermin Serna of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-5280.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-5289.title: Plogger Input Validation Flaw in 'id' Parameter Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2012-5289.body: A vulnerability was reported in Plogger. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'id' parameter of 'index.php' and 'gallery.php' is not properly validated. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.Cyber White Hats reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5289.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2012-5295.title: FuseTalk Input Validation Flaw in 'login.cfm' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-5295.body: A vulnerability was reported in FuseTalk. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'login.cfm' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the FuseTalk software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://st2tea.blogspot.com/2012/01/fusetalk-forums-v32-cross-site.htmlSony reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5295.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the FuseTalk software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-5321.title: TikiWiki Input Validation Flaw in ''tiki-featured_link.php'' Permits Frame Injection Attacks
CVE-2012-5321.body: A vulnerability was reported in TikiWiki. A remote user can frame injection attacks.The 'tiki-featured_link.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TikiWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/tiki-featured_link.php?type=f&url=http://[attacker]The original advisory is available at:http://st2tea.blogspot.com/2012/02/tiki-wiki-cms-groupware-frame-injection.htmlSony reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5321.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TikiWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-5371.title: Ruby Hash Table Collision Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5371.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger hash collisions and cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system.Jean-Philippe Aumasson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5371.extra: A remote user can cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system.

CVE-2012-5417.title: Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager JBoss RMI Services Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2012-5417.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to JBoss Application Server Remote Method Invocation (RMI) services to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System or root privileges.Both the SAN server and LAN server components are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCtz44924 and CSCua31204 to this vulnerability.Paul O'Grady of Security Compass reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5417.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2012-5424.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System Password Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass TACACS+ Authentication
CVE-2012-5424.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Secure Access Control System. A remote user can bypass TACACS+ authentication.The system does not properly validate user-supplied passwords when TACACS+ is the authentication protocol and the Cisco Secure Access Control System (ACS) is configured with an LDAP external identity store.A remote user with knowledge of a valid username can send a specially crafted sequence of characters when prompted for the user password to bypass TACACS+ authentication.Version 5.4 is not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCuc65634 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5424.extra: A remote user can bypass TACACS+ authentication.

CVE-2012-5478.title: JBoss Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Hijack User Sessions or Credentials, and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-5478.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can hijack a user session in certain cases. A remote user can obtain a user's credentials in certain cases.A remote user can access the JMXInvokerHAServlet and EJBInvokerHAServlet invoker servlets by default in some profiles [CVE-2012-0874]. If security interceptor's second layer of authentication is bypassed via a misconfiguration or is disabled, a remote user can execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the Jboss server.David Jorm of the Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.In a non-default configuration, the CallerIdentityLoginModule may retain the password from the previous call when the remote user provides a null password [CVE-2012-3369]. A remote user may be able to hijack a previously-authenticated user's session.Carlo de Wolf of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.If no security context is provided, the SecurityAssociation.getCredential() function returns the previous credential [CVE-2012-3370]. A remote user may be able to obtain the credentials of a previously-authenticated user.Carlo de Wolf of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.The JMX Invoker may not properly restrict access to users with specific roles [CVE-2012-5478]. A remote authenticated user may be able to perform JMX operations requiring a role that they do not have.Derek Horton of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5478.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.A remote user can hijack a user session in certain cases.A remote user can obtain a user's credentials in certain cases.

CVE-2012-5516.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Authenticated Users Access Data
CVE-2012-5516.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote authenticated user can access restricted data on the target system. A remote user can conduct man-in-the-middle attacks to gain root access.Red Hat Enterprise Linux hosts are not properly added to the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization (RHEV) environment [CVE-2012-0860]. A local user on the host to be added to the RHEV environment can place specially crafted files in the '/tmp' directory to gain elevated privileges.The system does not properly validate SSL certificates for HTTPS connections when Python configuration scripts are downloaded [CVE-2012-0861]. A remote user on the local network can conduct a man-in-the-middle attack to potentially gain root access on the host being added to the RHEV environment.The system does not properly lock the screen on a virtual machine between Simple Protocol for Independent Computing Environments (SPICE) session [CVE-2011-4316]. A local user on a virtual machine may be able to gain access to another user's unlocked desktop session.The system does not properly wipe-after-delete when moving disks between storage domains [CVE-2012-5516]. A user may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.The system back end does not properly check the privileges of users making requests via the SOAP and GWT APIs. A remote authenticated user can access restricted data [CVE-2012-2696].Red Hat reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-5516.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can access restricted data on the target system.A remote user can conduct man-in-the-middle attacks to gain root access.

CVE-2012-5529.title: Firebird Null Pointer Dereference on Empty Query Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5529.body: A vulnerability was reported in Firebird. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send an empty dynamic SQL query when trace mode is enabled to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target Firebird server to crash.
CVE-2012-5529.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2012-5533.title: lighttpd Connection Header Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5533.body: A vulnerability was reported in lighttpd. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Connection header value to cause the target service to enter an infinite loop.A demonstration exploit value is provided:"Connection: TE,,Keep-Alive"Jesse Sipprell from McClatchy Interactive, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5533.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2012-5566.title: Horde Groupware Input Validation Flaw in Calendar Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-5566.body: A vulnerability was reported in Horde Groupware. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The calendar does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Horde Groupware software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The tasks and search views are affected.
CVE-2012-5566.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Horde Groupware software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-5614.title: MySQL Bug in UpdateXML() Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5614.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted UpdateXML() command to cause the target mysqld service to crash.Kingcope reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5614.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target mysqld to crash.

CVE-2012-5643.title: Squid Input Validation Bug in 'cachemgr.cgi' Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5643.body: A vulnerability was reported in Squid. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted requests to exploit an input validation flaw in 'cachemgr.cgi' and cause the target service to consume excessive resources on the target system.Coverity Scan Project reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5643.extra: A remote user can consume excessive resources on the target system.

CVE-2012-5668.title: FreeType Multiple Bugs in BDF Implementation Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-5668.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeType. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.A null pointer dereference can be triggered in bdf_free_font() [CVE-2012-5668].An out-of-bounds read in can be triggered in _bdf_parse_glyphs() [CVE-2012-5669].An out-of-bounds write can be triggered in _bdf_parse_glyphs() [CVE-2012-5670].Mateusz Jurczyk of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-5668.extra: A remote user can create a font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-5669.title: FreeType Multiple Bugs in BDF Implementation Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-5669.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeType. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.A null pointer dereference can be triggered in bdf_free_font() [CVE-2012-5668].An out-of-bounds read in can be triggered in _bdf_parse_glyphs() [CVE-2012-5669].An out-of-bounds write can be triggered in _bdf_parse_glyphs() [CVE-2012-5670].Mateusz Jurczyk of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-5669.extra: A remote user can create a font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-5670.title: FreeType Multiple Bugs in BDF Implementation Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2012-5670.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in FreeType. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.A null pointer dereference can be triggered in bdf_free_font() [CVE-2012-5668].An out-of-bounds read in can be triggered in _bdf_parse_glyphs() [CVE-2012-5669].An out-of-bounds write can be triggered in _bdf_parse_glyphs() [CVE-2012-5670].Mateusz Jurczyk of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-5670.extra: A remote user can create a font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2012-5703.title: VMware ESX/ESXi vSphere API Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5703.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESX/ESXi. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted vSphere API request to disable the host daemon. As a result, management activities on the host will be interrupted. Virtual machines running on the target host are not affected.Sebastian Tello of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5703.extra: A remote user can disable the host daemon.

CVE-2012-5756.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 Appliance Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5756.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM WebSphere DataPower. A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary JMX operations on the target system [CVE-2012-5759]. The vendor has assigned APAR IC85748 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to stop server processes [CVE-2012-5758]. The vendor has assigned APAR IC86908 to this vulnerability.The product uses a common secret key for device-to-device communications. A remote user with knowledge of the key can impersonate appliance collective members [CVE-2012-5756]. The vendor has assigned APAR PM68926 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5756.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges.A remote user can cause server processes to stop.A remote user can impersonate appliance collective members.

CVE-2012-5758.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 Appliance Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5758.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM WebSphere DataPower. A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary JMX operations on the target system [CVE-2012-5759]. The vendor has assigned APAR IC85748 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to stop server processes [CVE-2012-5758]. The vendor has assigned APAR IC86908 to this vulnerability.The product uses a common secret key for device-to-device communications. A remote user with knowledge of the key can impersonate appliance collective members [CVE-2012-5756]. The vendor has assigned APAR PM68926 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5758.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges.A remote user can cause server processes to stop.A remote user can impersonate appliance collective members.

CVE-2012-5759.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 Appliance Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-5759.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM WebSphere DataPower. A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges. The vendor has assigned APAR IC85748 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to stop server processes [CVE-2012-5758]. The vendor has assigned APAR IC86908 to this vulnerability.The product uses a common secret key for device-to-device communications. A remote user with knowledge of the key can impersonate appliance collective members [CVE-2012-5756]. The vendor has assigned APAR PM68926 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5759.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges.A remote user can cause server processes to stop.A remote user can impersonate appliance collective members.

CVE-2012-5879.title: McAfee Virtual Technician ActiveX Control Save() Function Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-5879.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee Virtual Technician. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can use the 'McHealthCheck.dll' ActiveX control Save() function to create or modify files with System level privileges.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 24565A99-ADDA-47B9-9E86-3C4C3360E256The vendor was notified on November 19, 2012.High-Tech Bridge Security Research Lab reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://www.htbridge.com/advisory/HTB23128
CVE-2012-5879.extra: A local user can obtain System level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-5951.title: IBM Tivoli NetView for z/OS Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-5951.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli NetView for z/OS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local Unix System Services user can gain the privileges of the NetView for z/OS application and execute an arbitrary program with those elevated privileges.
CVE-2012-5951.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2012-5978.title: VMware View Server Directory Traversal Flaw Discloses Files to Remote Users
CVE-2012-5978.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware View Server. A remote user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view arbitrary files on target system.The Digital Defense, Inc. (DDI) Vulnerability Research Team (VRT) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-5978.extra: A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2012-6030.title: Xen Transcendent Memory (TMEM) Multiple Flaws Lets Local Users on the Guest Operating System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host
CVE-2012-6030.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target host operating system. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.Several sub-operations of the Transcendent Memory (TMEM) hypercall do not properly validate user-supplied input or user privileges or contain other vulnerabilities.A local user on the guest operating system can overwrite hypervisor memory with arbitrary content to gain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.Systems with 'tmem' is specified on the hypervisor command line are affected.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-6030.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.

CVE-2012-6031.title: Xen Transcendent Memory (TMEM) Multiple Flaws Lets Local Users on the Guest Operating System Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host
CVE-2012-6031.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target host operating system. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.Several sub-operations of the Transcendent Memory (TMEM) hypercall do not properly validate user-supplied input or user privileges or contain other vulnerabilities.A local user on the guest operating system can overwrite hypervisor memory with arbitrary content to gain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.Systems with 'tmem' is specified on the hypervisor command line are affected.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-6031.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can obtain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.

A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.Several sub-operations of the Transcendent Memory (TMEM) hypercall do not properly validate user-supplied input or user privileges or contain other vulnerabilities.A local user on the guest operating system can overwrite hypervisor memory with arbitrary content to gain elevated privileges on the target host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target host operating system to crash.Systems with 'tmem' is specified on the hypervisor command line are affected.Matthew Daley reported this vulnerability.

CVE-2012-6395.title: Cisco ASA CIFS UNC Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-6395.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to become unavailable.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCuc65775 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-6395.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to become unavailable.

CVE-2012-6396.title: Cisco NX-OS Nexus 7000 Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2012-6396.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Nexus 7000. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.Systems with a higher-density line-card replaced in the same slot by a lower-density card and with the management station continuing to try and poll the non-existent higher ports are affected.Cisco has a Cisco Bug ID CSCud44300 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-6396.extra: A remote user can consume excessive memory and system resources on the target system.

CVE-2012-6447.title: Splunk Web Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-6447.body: A vulnerability was reported in Splunk Web. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Splunk software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Groupon Security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-6447.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Splunk Web software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-6692.title: Yoast WordPress SEO Plugin Input Validation in 'snippet preview' Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2012-6692.body: A vulnerability was reported in Yoast WordPress SEO Plugin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'snippet preview' function in the admin panel does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Yoast WordPress SEO (WordPress Plugin) software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/wp-admin/post-new.php?post_title=The original advisory is available at:https://inventropy.us/blog/yoast-seo-plugin-cross-site-scripting-vulnerability/Charles Neill reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2012-6692.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Yoast WordPress SEO (WordPress Plugin) software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2012-6706.title: Sophos Anti-Virus Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code with Root Privileges and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2012-6706.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Sophos Anti-Virus. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when processed by the target anti-virus software, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with root or System privileges.Visual Basic executable, RAR, PDF, and Microsoft CAB file formats are affected.On Windows-based systems, a local user can exploit a flaw in directory access permissions of the network update service to replace certain files and cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system with System privileges.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will run in the security context of an arbitrary site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.On Windows-based systems, the Sophos Buffer Overflow Protection System (BOPS) effectively disables the operating system's Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) protections.On Windows-based systems, the software installs a Layered Service Provider (LSP) that loads modules from a low-integrity writable directory, which effectively disables Internet Explorer's protected mode.The original advisory is available at:https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/sophailv2.pdfTavis Ormandy reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2012-6706.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with root or system privileges.A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
